translation.en: ♪ Hey ♪
translation.it: SOLO CHE ANCORA NON LO SAPETE.

translation.en: -♪ This place is hot… ♪ -[man 1] That's not good.
♪ So glad we made it ♪
-♪ You gotta gimme some lovin'… ♪ -[gasps]
[woman on comms] What are you doing, Captain? I think it's pretty obvious. I'm stealing this jet.
translation.it: - Che stai facendo, Capitano? - Mi pare ovvio. Sto rubando questo jet.

translation.en: [woman] I think it's pretty obvious you're trying to.
translation.it: È ovvio che ci stai provando. Sai che posso tracciare il tuo salto.

translation.en: -You know I can track your jump. -Yeah, but you know that I know that.
translation.it: È ovvio che ci stai provando. Sai che posso tracciare il tuo salto. Tu sai che lo so, ma c'è qualcosa che uno di noi non sa.

translation.en: So one of us doesn't know something else, right?
translation.it: Tu sai che lo so, ma c'è qualcosa che uno di noi non sa.

translation.en: [man 2] Ma'am, he's initiated wormhole sequencing.
translation.it: Signora, sta per aprire un wormhole.

translation.en: [woman] Adam, I want you to listen very carefully.
translation.it: Adam, voglio che mi ascolti attentamente.

translation.en: If you don't abort right now, I will shoot you out of the--
translation.it: Se non ti fermi immediatamente, ti cancello dal…

translation.en: I'm sorry to interrupt what I'm sure is gonna be a scary threat,
translation.it: Non per interrompere la tua magistrale intimidazione,

translation.en: but if I'm right, your tracking system is about to…
translation.it: ma il tuo sistema di tracciamento sta per…

translation.en: -…crash. -♪ We made it, baby ♪
-♪ Gimme some lovin' ♪ -♪ Gimme some lovin' ♪
-Okay, let's not die! -[alarm beeping]
[boy] Adam!
I'm gonna kill you!
Oh no. I'm so sorry.
That's my bad. Hi.
-No. -Okay. Bye!
[boy] Reed! Get your ass back here.
translation.it: Reed! Riporta subito qui le chiappe.

translation.en: -Got anything else you wanna say? -Actually, I--
translation.it: - C'è altro che vuoi dirmi? - In realtà…

translation.en: -[groans] -Huh? No more jokes?
-Oh, I'm gonna enjoy this. -[Adam] Who talks like that?
translation.it: - Mi divertirò a dartele. - Ma chi parla così?

translation.en: Did you order, like, a "Bully Starter Kit" on Amazon or somethin'?
translation.it: Hai ordinato un kit per bulli principianti su Amazon?

translation.en: I mean, do you even hear yourself? Chuck, we talked about this.
translation.it: Cioè, ma ti senti? Chuck, ne avevamo parlato.

translation.en: -I didn't say anything. -Shut up, Chuck.
translation.it: - Non ho detto niente. - Taci, Chuck.

translation.en: [man on PA] There will be an assembly in the gymnasium now. Please proceed to the gymnasium.
translation.it: È in programma un'assemblea in palestra. Per favore, procedete…

translation.en: Not a word.
[Mrs. Reed] See his face?
And, what, you're gonna suspend Adam? Because what?
translation.it: E vuole sospendere Adam? Per cosa?

translation.en: You think he started a fight with that thug Ray? Was it Ray Dollarhyde again?
translation.it: Crede abbia provocato quel delinquente? Ray Dollarhyde, di nuovo?

translation.en: It's barely been a year since we lost his father. You could show some compassion.
translation.it: Ha perso il padre da neanche un anno. Mostri un po' di compassione.

translation.en: [Adam] It wasn't my fault. I know you, Adam. I know that mouth of yours.
translation.it: - Non è stata colpa mia. - Conosco te e la tua boccaccia.

translation.en: I know exactly what got you punched.
He was giving me crap in front of the whole class.
translation.it: Mi ha preso in giro davanti a tutti. Non potevo tacere.

translation.en: -I couldn't just take it. -He's twice your size.
translation.it: Mi ha preso in giro davanti a tutti. Non potevo tacere. È il doppio di te.

translation.en: Everyone is twice my size. I've seen babies bigger than me.
translation.it: Come tutti! Ho visto neonati più grandi di me.

translation.en: -I don't understand you. -Dad would.
What's going on, honey? Can you just tell me?
If I keep having to leave work in the middle of the day, I'm gonna lose my job.
translation.it: Se continuo a uscire a metà giornata perderò il lavoro.

translation.en: It's the third time you've been suspended for fighting.
translation.it: È la terza sospensione per rissa.

translation.en: You'd think I'd be better at it by now.
This goes on your permanent record. Get that? Care about your future?
translation.it: Finirà nel tuo fascicolo. Capisci? Ci pensi al futuro?

translation.en: Do you? Son, you'd better start caring, because the future is coming,
translation.it: O no? Figliolo, farai meglio a pensarci, perché il futuro sta arrivando.

translation.en: sooner than you think.
[Mrs. Reed] Hey, Adam.
Adam, I'm headed out.
Come and have your dinner.
Where you goin'?
Oh, just out to dinner with a friend.
translation.it: Vado a cena con un amico.

translation.en: Which friend?
-His name's Derek. We work together. -You're goin' on a date.
translation.it: - Derek. Lavoriamo insieme. - È un appuntamento.

translation.en: -Not a date. I don't think it's a date. -Your dress thinks it is.
translation.it: - No. Almeno non credo. - Il tuo vestito dice il contrario.

translation.en: Oh, it is a date. I am going on a date. Why am I going on a date?
translation.it: È un appuntamento. Ho un appuntamento. Perché ci vado?

translation.en: Can we please stop saying "date" now? Thanks.
Adam, I'm sorry. We… we should have spoken about this.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, Adam. Avremmo dovuto parlarne prima.

translation.en: I don't know how to handle it. Let's talk about it now.
translation.it: Non so come gestirla. Parliamone adesso.

translation.en: -Dear God, no. -No! You can have any kind of feeling.
translation.it: - Gesù, no. - No! Puoi reagire come vuoi.

translation.en: -It's normal. As long as we're a team-- -[phone alert]
translation.it: Va bene, basta che ci confrontiamo.

translation.en: Oh! Time to go.
[Mrs. Reed] He texted me? Well, look at that.
translation.it: Mi ha scritto un messaggio? Ma pensa.

translation.en: It's a whole new world.
translation.it: È un mondo tutto nuovo. Ma ne parliamo quando torno.

translation.en: -But we will talk about it tonight, honey. -Mom, wait.
translation.it: È un mondo tutto nuovo. Ma ne parliamo quando torno. Mamma, aspetta.

translation.en: -What? -Turn around.
-Make good choices, okay? -Said the boy who got suspended.
translation.it: - Fai la brava. - Disse il ragazzo sospeso.

translation.en: [chuckles] I love you, honey.
I love you too, Mom. More than I know.
translation.it: Anch'io, mamma. Più di quanto immagini.

translation.en: [Mrs. Reed] Listen, while I'm out, lock up the back.
translation.it: Senti, tieni chiuso sul retro, finché sono fuori.

translation.en: No ovens, no answering the door, no video games.
translation.it: Non usare il forno, non aprire la porta e niente videogiochi!

translation.en: What is it? You see something?
-[whining] -Hawking, stop! Hawking!
[echoing] Hawking!
-[Hawking whimpers] -Oh my God. You scared the crap out of me.
translation.it: Oddio, mi hai spaventato a morte.

translation.en: -[rustling] -Who's there?
I don't think we should be out here.
translation.it: Non credo che dovremmo essere qui.

translation.en: We're okay.
-[barking] -Hawking!
Take it easy.
-Or, you know, fall down and scream. -[clattering]
-Jeez. Who the hell are you? -Put the bat down.
translation.it: - Chi diavolo sei? - Posa la mazza.

translation.en: Put the bat down. I'm not gonna hurt you, I promise.
translation.it: - Chi diavolo sei? - Posa la mazza. Non ti farò del male.

translation.en: -What are you doing in here? -Mostly bleeding.
translation.it: - Che fai qui? - Più che altro sanguino.

translation.en: [sighs] Wait, how old are you?
-What? -How old are you?
Twelve.
[whispers] Twelve…
Shit!
-How did you get in my dad's garage? -I… It was open.
translation.it: - Come sei entrato nel garage di papà? - Era aperto.

translation.en: No, it wasn't. And that is a flight suit. Are you a pilot?
translation.it: Invece no. E quella è una tuta da pilota. Sei un pilota?

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, listen to me. Uh--
Don't-- Hey, don't call anyone. Put the phone down. I won't hurt you.
translation.it: Non chiamare nessuno, ok? Non ti farò del male.

translation.en: You said that already. -Well, it bears-- God damn it! -[squelching]
translation.it: - Questo l'hai già detto. - Beh, vale la pena… Maledizione!

translation.en: Uh, it bears repeating. -[sighs] -That's a lot of blood.
translation.it: - Vale la pena di ribadirlo. - Perdi molto sangue.

translation.en: Well… well, I have so much more in my body. Where's your mother?
translation.it: Beh, ne ho molto altro in circolo. Dov'è tua madre?

translation.en: On a date.
With who?
-What? -With who? What's his name?
translation.it: - Come? - Con chi? Come si chiama?

translation.en: -I don't know. Derek? -Derek?
Derek. Derek, Derek, Derek. That's, yes, the guy with the, um… with the mouth mullet.
translation.it: Derek. Ah, quello col muschietto sul mento.

translation.en: -The goatee? -Yeah.
So say goatee.
-Yeah, he doesn't matter. -None of them matter.
translation.it: - Non è importante. - Nessuno di loro lo è.

translation.en: Nice dog.
I'm gonna go inside the house. I'm gonna get some stuff.
translation.it: Vado in casa, devo prendere delle cose.

translation.en: Hey, careful with that.
-Stay here. -[clattering]
[groans] Come on.
[grunts] Told you to stay in the garage.
And let some creepy dude just wander around my house alone?
translation.it: Lasciando che un tizio inquietante giri per casa mia?

translation.en: -Yeah… -I don't think so.
Yeah, believe me. I don't wanna be here any more than you want me here.
I just gotta stop bleeding long enough.
Gotta dress the wound, prevent a nasty infection,
translation.it: Mi fascio la ferita, prevengo un'orribile infezione

translation.en: and I will be on my merry way.
translation.it: e me ne vado per la mia strada.

translation.en: Don't touch that.
-I was just looking. -Don't touch my stuff.
-Is this a lightsaber? -No, it's not.
-Okay. -No. Enough with the bat!
translation.it: Ok. No. Basta con la mazza, ok? Ti avrei fatto del male, se avessi voluto.

translation.en: -[clattering] -If I wanted to hurt you, I would have.
translation.it: No. Basta con la mazza, ok? Ti avrei fatto del male, se avessi voluto.

translation.en: If I'm being honest with myself, you have a very punchable face.
translation.it: Perché, se vuoi saperlo, hai proprio una faccia da schiaffi.

translation.en: -Oh my-- -God! That--
Gah! That bullet went straight through. Good. -Cool. -Wait, wait, wait. Bullet? You were shot?
translation.it: - Il proiettile è uscito. Bene. - Aspetta. Ti hanno sparato?

translation.en: Yeah-- No, actually, no.
No, I was stabbed with a bullet. What do you think, you moron?
translation.it: No, mi hanno pugnalato con un proiettile. Tu che dici, idiota?

translation.en: -I'm a moron? You're the one who was shot. -All right, okay, that's it. [coughs]
translation.it: - Io, idiota? Tu ti sei fatto sparare. - Ok, basta.

translation.en: -[farting sound] -That… Wow… That, uh…
That's weird. It farts when I cough. -[coughs] -[farting sound]
-Gross. -Super gross.
I'm gonna go upstairs, grab some stuff. Stay cool. You can trust me.
translation.it: Vado a prendere delle cose. Stai tranquillo, puoi fidarti.

translation.en: Easy for you to say. I'm the one who ends up in a therapist's office,
translation.it: Per te è facile. Sono io che finisco in terapia a raccontare dove mi hai toccato.

translation.en: telling them about where the bad man touched me.
translation.it: Sono io che finisco in terapia a raccontare dove mi hai toccato.

translation.en: Oh God! That's where you go? Immediately? You are dark, man.
translation.it: Oddio! È questa la prima cosa a cui pensi? Tu hai dei problemi.

translation.en: -[young Adam] Who even are you? -That is classified.
translation.it: Ma tu chi sei? Informazione riservata.

translation.en: Why are you here?
-Also classi… classified. -Are you in the air force?
translation.it: - Anche questo è riservato. - Sei nell'aeronautica?

translation.en: When I say "classified," what does your brain hear? Chocolate?
-What's with the lightsaber? -It's not a lightsaber.
translation.it: - E la spada laser? - Non è una spada laser.

translation.en: Jesus Christ, Adam. -I need you to play it cool. -Wait.
translation.it: - Cristo, Adam. Fai il bravo. - Aspetta.

translation.en: -I know playing it cool isn't your thing. -Wait.
translation.it: - So che non fa per te. Non è mai… - Aspetta!

translation.en: -It never has been-- -Wait, wait! How do you know my name?
translation.it: - So che non fa per te. Non è mai… - Aspetta! Aspetta! Come sai il mio nome?

translation.en: You're Adam Reed. Born February 10th, 2010.
translation.it: Tu sei Adam Reed. Nato il 10 febbraio 2010.

translation.en: Your parents are Ellie and Louis Reed. Louis would've died about a year ago.
translation.it: Figlio di Ellie e Louis Reed. Louis è morto un anno fa.

translation.en: You don't play any sports because of acute asthma. -Plus you're freakishly small for 12. -[frantic barking]
translation.it: Non fai sport a causa di una forte asma. Sei stranamente piccolo per avere 12 anni.

translation.en: You go to Franklin Middle School, where you've been suspended two, three times for fighting,
translation.it: Vai alla Franklin Middle School, dove ti hanno sospeso più volte per rissa,

translation.en: which is ironic because you can't fight to save your life.
translation.it: il che è buffo perché fai schifo a fare a botte.

translation.en: [in unison] Hawking! Zip it!
How do you know my dog's name? Because I named him.
translation.it: - Come sai il nome del mio cane? - Perché gliel'ho dato io.

translation.en: -Where are you goin'? -[gasps]
-[wheezing] -Oh God.
[shakes inhaler] All right.
Here, ready? Deep breath.
translation.it: Ecco. Pronto? Fai un bel respiro.

translation.en: Hold it. Three, two, one.
translation.it: Trattieni il fiato. Tre, due, uno.

translation.en: Everybody gets a trophy.
When I was seven,
I ran into a table on the patio.
translation.it: sono inciampato nel tavolo sul patio.

translation.en: I got 12 stitches.
[in unison] Right here.
You knew how to get into my dad's garage.
translation.it: Sai come entrare nel garage di papà.

translation.en: You knew how to close the fridge.
You knew how to time my breathing.
We have the same scar.
And you're wearing my dad's watch.
This watch.
This watch.
You're me.
Holy shi--
That's classified. But yes…
I once was.
I can't believe you're future me.
translation.it: Non posso credere che tu sia il futuro me.

translation.en: Okay, you came to terms with that pretty quickly. It's a little disturbing, actually.
translation.it: L'hai accettato in fretta. È un po' inquietante.

translation.en: -So why are you here? -Rescue mission.
translation.it: - Che fai qui? - Missione di soccorso.

translation.en: I wasn't supposed to land here. I was aiming for 2018.
translation.it: Non dovevo finire qui. Miravo al 2018.

translation.en: -I need to get there as soon as possible. -Who were you trying to save in 2018?
translation.it: - Devo arrivarci al più presto. - Chi devi salvare nel 2018?

translation.en: Really?
Fine. Can you at least tell me how you got here?
translation.it: Ok. Vuoi almeno dirmi come sei finito qui?

translation.en: I'll show ya.
What was that?
-Crap. -What?
Uh, we're gonna switch to plan A, which is where you come in.
translation.it: Passiamo al piano A. E qui entri in gioco tu.

translation.en: You see, time jets, like all tech in the future,
translation.it: I jet temporali, come tutta la tecnologia futura,

translation.en: is coded to its user's DNA.
Because I'm injured… aah, the jet won't even clear me to fly,
translation.it: Dato che sono ferito il jet non mi autorizzerà a entrare,

translation.en: which means I can't get in there to fix her.
But guess who can?
There she is.
[Adam] Away we go.
Okay. Sit down.
-Oh my God. -Yeah, yeah, yeah. Sit down.
Let's see what we're dealing with here. All right, some minor shield damage.
translation.it: Vediamo come siamo messi. Qualche danno allo scudo. Perdite di refrigerante.

translation.en: -Coolant leaks. -[beeping]
translation.it: Qualche danno allo scudo. Perdite di refrigerante.

translation.en: I don't know what that is, but when is a flashing red light ever good?
translation.it: Quello non so cosa sia, ma il rosso non va mai bene.

translation.en: I know you wanna touch all the pretty buttons
with your sticky little child fingers, but the reactor has a quantum signature.
translation.it: con le tue piccole dita appiccicose, ma il reattore ha una firma quantistica.

translation.en: You fire it up, they can find us.
If they're here. Who are "they"?
I'm glad that you didn't ask me that because "they" are classified.
translation.it: È un bene che tu non l'abbia chiesto, perché è riservato.

translation.en: -I already know you're from the future. -Believe me, I regret that.
translation.it: So che vieni dal futuro. Credimi, lo rimpiango.

translation.en: I had no intention of coming back to revisit… this.
translation.it: Non avevo intenzione di tornare a questo periodo.

translation.en: Jesus. Okay.
Okay, I've isolated the damaged relays,
translation.it: Ok, ho isolato i relè danneggiati,

translation.en: so the ship should be able to start repairing itself.
translation.it: quindi la nave dovrebbe essere in grado di ripararsi da sola.

translation.en: How long will that take?
Ah, it's at 50% capacity, so hopefully less time than it takes me to heal.
translation.it: Funziona al 50%, quindi spero che finisca prima che la ferita guarisca.

translation.en: [young Adam] Wait.
-Do you remember this? -Remember what?
This. Right here, right now.
You being here in 2022?
translation.it: - Tu, qui nel 2022? - So dove vuoi arrivare.

translation.en: -Know where you're going with this. -If this is happening to me--
translation.it: - Tu, qui nel 2022? - So dove vuoi arrivare. - Se sta succedendo a me… - Perdi tempo.

translation.en: -You're wasting your time. -That means it already happened to you.
translation.it: - Se sta succedendo a me… - Perdi tempo. …a te è già successo.

translation.en: Unless it works like a multiverse, where each ripple creates an alternate timeline--
translation.it: A meno che non ci sia un multiverso con infinite linee temporali.

translation.en: It's not a multiverse! My God, we watched too many movies.
translation.it: Non c'è nessun multiverso! Dio, abbiamo visto troppi film.

translation.en: I just wanna know.
Okay.
Okay, the prevailing wisdom is that when I go back to my fixed time,
translation.it: L'idea è che quando tornerò nel mio Tempo Stabilito

translation.en: my memory… our memories, they reform, they reconcile.
translation.it: i miei ricordi, i nostri ricordi, si correggeranno da soli.

translation.en: -But not while I'm here. -Fixed time? What's that?
translation.it: - Ma non finché resto qui. - Tempo Stabilito?

translation.en: There's only one place in time where you belong on a quantum level,
translation.it: C'è solo un punto nel tempo a cui appartieni davvero,

translation.en: where you're not screwing around with the cosmos like I am.
translation.it: quando non vai in giro a fare casino come me.

translation.en: That is your fixed time. Where you actually belong.
translation.it: Quello è il tuo Tempo Stabilito. Il luogo a cui appartieni.

translation.en: So by being here and telling me this, you may have just changed my whole future?
translation.it: Quindi stando qui e dicendomi tutto questo potresti aver cambiato il mio futuro?

translation.en: Honestly? Your future is pretty tragic either way.
translation.it: Avrai comunque un futuro piuttosto tragico.

translation.en: [laughs] I'm kidding! I'm kidding.
I'm not kidding.
I'm kidding. Let's go. Come on. Here we go.
[young Adam] So what happens now?
Nothin'. I'm just gonna lay down. Let this bullet wound heal.
translation.it: Niente, vado a sdraiarmi. La ferita deve rimarginarsi.

translation.en: Think about some key investment opportunities for your future.
translation.it: Ti farò sapere in cosa vale la pena investire.

translation.en: -Wait, like Biff from Back to the-- -Are you out of your tiny mind?
translation.it: - Come Biff in Ritorno… - Sei fuori di testa?

translation.en: Get back in the house before our mother gets home, and don't make it weird.
translation.it: Va' a casa prima che la mamma torni e non fare lo strambo.

translation.en: -[sniffles] -Hey. [frustratedly] Yes?
-This is amazing. -Isn't it, though?
Mind hitting the light on your way out?
Oh, hey. I'm surprised you're still up.
translation.it: Oh, ciao. Mi sorprende vederti ancora in piedi.

translation.en: Well, this night's been full of surprises, mother. That's chilling. What happened?
translation.it: - Oggi è pieno di sorprese. - Allarmante. Che succede?

translation.en: How was your not-a-date? Will you be seeing him again?
translation.it: Com'è andato il tuo non-appuntamento? Vi rivedrete?

translation.en: -No. I don't know. I don't think so. -[knocking at door]
translation.it: No. Non lo so. Non credo.

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi.
-Me again. -Yes, it is.
You left your scarf in my car.
-I did. Gosh, thanks. -[Derek] Oh, hey there, kiddo.
translation.it: Pare di sì. Cavolo, grazie. Ehi, ragazzo.

translation.en: Oh. This is my son, Adam. Adam, this is Derek.
translation.it: Ecco mio figlio Adam. Adam, ti presento Derek.

translation.en: Oh, hey, Adam.
Hello. You have a wonderful mouth mullet. You must be very proud.
translation.it: Ciao. Bel muschietto sul mento. Ne sarai molto fiero.

translation.en: Oh my gosh, Adam. [laughs]
translation.it: - Santo cielo, Adam. - Nessuno l'aveva mai chiamato così.

translation.en: -Never heard it called that before. -Well, thanks again.
translation.it: - Santo cielo, Adam. - Nessuno l'aveva mai chiamato così. - Grazie ancora. - Figurati. A presto.

translation.en: Sure. See you soon.
Unlikely, but I'll put in a good word for you.
translation.it: Improbabile, ma perorerò la tua causa.

translation.en: Okay. Okay. I'll see you at work.
-[Derek] Yeah. -Bye.
He seems nice.
What?
You can be a real jerk sometimes.
You know that? [sighs]
Hey there. Good morning.
Shouldn't you be at work?
Yeah, I need to pay the insurance on the house today.
translation.it: Prima devo pagare l'assicurazione sulla casa.

translation.en: Had it in the calendar, but I can't find the statement.
translation.it: Ce l'ho nel calendario, ma non trovo l'attestato.

translation.en: [Adam] With that filing system? Shocking. It should all be online.
translation.it: Tra tutti quei fogli? Sconvolgente. Dovrebbe essere tutto online.

translation.en: The minute I find myself with a few extra hours, I will set up those accounts.
translation.it: Appena avrò qualche ora libera me ne occuperò.

translation.en: Until then, this is how your dad did it.
translation.it: Fino ad allora, è così che faceva tuo padre.

translation.en: Hey, grab a pile.
Sorry. I gotta get to my room to think about what I've done.
translation.it: Scusa, ma devo andare a riflettere sui miei errori.

translation.en: Okay. I gotta go.
Call me if you need me.
[Adam] I won't.
Mom's gone to work.
-Dad's favorite song. -♪ There's only one thing ♪
translation.it: È la canzone preferita di papà.

translation.en: -♪ Gonna set you free… ♪ -Yeah, me too.
-♪ That's my love… ♪ -See, we agreed on something. -Maybe the only thing. -♪ That's my love… ♪
translation.it: Una cosa su cui eravamo d'accordo. Forse l'unica.

translation.en: -♪ Let my love open the door… ♪ -What?
-I just… You're… kinda ripped. -♪ Let my love open the door ♪
translation.it: È solo che… sei veramente grosso.

translation.en: -♪ When everything feels… ♪ -Okay.
Do you work out?
-My genetics don't… -Ever have a thought and not let it out?
translation.it: Hai mai pensieri che non esprimi a voce?

translation.en: Could be fun to just keep it in.
Maybe in the future, there's, like… like, gene therapy or nanotechnology for--
translation.it: Forse in futuro ci sarà la terapia genica o la nanotecnologia per…

translation.en: -Don't do it. Don't… don't do it. -♪ Let my love open the door ♪
-♪ Let my love open the door… ♪ -So when does… all this happen.
Does everyone skip leg day in the future?
translation.it: Non si allenano le gambe nel futuro?

translation.en: -♪ To your heart… ♪ -Does it happen in college?
Oh, wait. Do we get a lot of girls in college? -I-- -Adam, time travel exists.
translation.it: - Rimorchiamo molte ragazze al college? - Adam, il viaggio nel tempo è realtà.

translation.en: [laughs] It exists. Isn't that crazy?
Every conceptual idea you have about the universe has just been thrown out the window.
translation.it: Ogni tua idea sull'universo è appena finita fuori dalla finestra.

translation.en: Yet your big question is, "Do I get laid?"
translation.it: Eppure la tua domanda è: "Farò sesso?"

translation.en: -Do I? -[Adam] Jesus Christ.
-I was just wondering. -[Adam] Wonder in silence.
translation.it: - Sono solo curioso. - Fallo in silenzio.

translation.en: -♪ Let my love open the door ♪ -Oh my God! It's gonna happen!
-Where you goin'? -Drugstore.
I need to get this wound closed up.
You're gonna go dressed like that?
Why don't you wear some of Dad's clothes?
How long ago was Dad's accident?
About a year and a half ago.
translation.it: Circa un anno e mezzo fa.

translation.en: She still hasn't cleaned out his closet.
She's not much of a housekeeper.
Hey. You have her to take care of you. She has no one. You understand?
translation.it: Ehi. Lei si prende cura di te, ma nessuno si prende cura di lei. Capito?

translation.en: Do you understand?
She wakes up every morning with a broken heart and a closet full of his clothes
translation.it: Ogni giorno si sveglia col cuore a pezzi e un armadio pieno di vestiti

translation.en: and gets nothing from you but a fistful of crap, and not even, like, ten seconds of genuine empathy.
translation.it: e deve subire tutte le tue stronzate senza neanche un minimo di empatia.

translation.en: I'm you, you know. Tell me about it.
translation.it: - Io sono te. - Non me ne parlare.

translation.en: You know, 30 years, you still get sick to your stomach every time you remember how you treated her now.
translation.it: Tra 30 anni ti verrà ancora la nausea ripensando a come l'hai trattata.

translation.en: I used to love this jacket.
Dad did too.
I keep waiting to wake up and miss him less,
translation.it: Continuo a sperare che mi manchi un po' meno,

translation.en: but that hasn't happened yet.
Do you still miss him?
Missed him while he was here.
-It's not gonna fit you. -Sure it will.
-[bleeping] -[young Adam] How's the jet? It's gettin' there.
translation.it: - Come va con il jet? - Ci siamo quasi.

translation.en: So the person you came to save is in 2018.
translation.it: La persona che sei venuto a salvare è nel 2018.

translation.en: And somehow, you ended up in 2022. How does that work? You just missed?
translation.it: E in qualche modo sei finito nel 2022. Come funziona? L'hai mancato?

translation.en: Well, I got shot when I was stealing the plane.
translation.it: Mi hanno sparato mentre rubavo il jet.

translation.en: So, uh… I was losin' blood. Ship was comin' apart.
translation.it: Perdevo sangue. La nave stava andando in pezzi.

translation.en: I jammed the coordinates. I didn't have time to double-check 'em.
translation.it: Ho improvvisato le coordinate senza ricontrollarle.

translation.en: -Wait, you stole the jet? -It's encoded to me.
translation.it: - Ma il jet è rubato? - Mi riconosce.

translation.en: So I didn't exactly steal it. I borrowed the shit out of it.
translation.it: Quindi non l'ho proprio rubato. L'ho preso in prestito.

translation.en: -There's a difference. Give me some cash. -You don't have money?
translation.it: È diverso. Dammi dei contanti. - Non hai soldi? - Non li usiamo, nel futuro.

translation.en: -We don't use money in the future. -Really?
translation.it: - Non hai soldi? - Non li usiamo, nel futuro. Davvero?

translation.en: Of course we use money in the future. Stay here.
translation.it: Ma certo che usiamo i soldi. Resta qui.

translation.en: [Chuck laughs] What's up, Reed?
Crap.
Well, look who we have here.
translation.it: Bene, bene. Guarda un po' chi abbiamo qui.

translation.en: Ray, can we just take a break from the ass kicking today?
translation.it: Ray, possiamo evitare di fare a pugni, oggi?

translation.en: I have a lot going on.
translation.it: Ho un sacco di cose da fare.

translation.en: Hey, guys. Enjoying our suspension?
translation.it: Ehi, ragazzi. Come va la sospensione?

translation.en: I am now.
[young Adam groans] That's my spleen.
I remember these little turd-burpers.
-Hey, man, we're, uh… just playin' around. -Quiet, Ray. This isn't about you.
translation.it: - Ehi, stiamo solo scherzando. - Taci, Ray. Non si tratta di te.

translation.en: Hey, what's goin' on? Huh?
Get it together. Ray's ready. You're embarrassing yourself.
translation.it: Forza, Ray è pronto. Così ti rendi ridicolo.

translation.en: So you're not gonna break this up?
God, no. That'd be irresponsible of me.
You'll just figure out some other way to pound the crap out of him.
translation.it: E poi troveresti un altro modo per riempirlo di botte.

translation.en: You always do.
He's got a big mouth. I get it.
translation.it: Ha la lingua lunga. Lo capisco.

translation.en: Point is, this fight needs to happen right now.
translation.it: Ma è ora di regolare i conti, proprio adesso.

translation.en: So just give us a second, okay, Ray?
Stretch out. You don't wanna pull a hammy.
What are you doing?
Hey, Ray Dollarhyde has been bullying you for years because you're small, and fragile, and you have a big mouth.
translation.it: Ray Dollarhyde ti tormenta da anni perché sei minuto, fragile e parli troppo.

translation.en: But here's the thing. He doesn't wanna fight.
translation.it: Ma lui non vuole battersi davvero.

translation.en: -I don't wanna fight either. -He doesn't know that, does he?
translation.it: - Neanch'io lo voglio. - Ma lui non lo sa!

translation.en: So you're gonna walk over there, and you're gonna raise your hands, and then you're gonna look Ray right in the eye.
translation.it: Quindi ora va' lì coi pugni bene alzati e guarda Ray dritto negli occhi.

translation.en: You're gonna smile in a way that says, "I've waited my entire life for this moment."
translation.it: Sorridi come per dire: "Aspetto questo momento da tutta la vita".

translation.en: Like you can't wait to watch his soul exit his body.
translation.it: Come se non vedessi l'ora di vedere la sua anima uscire dal corpo.

translation.en: Then you're gonna drop to your knees and punch him hard in the private bathing suit parts.
translation.it: Poi mettiti in ginocchio a dagli un pugno nelle parti intime.

translation.en: -I'm sorry, the what now? -Ah! Are we gonna smoke this banana?
translation.it: Scusa, come? Vogliamo fumare questa banana o stare qui tutto il giorno? Vai!

translation.en: Or are we gonna talk about it all day? Let's go, go, go, go, go.
translation.it: Vogliamo fumare questa banana o stare qui tutto il giorno? Vai!

translation.en: I'm gonna smoke your banana, motherf--
translation.it: Ora fumo la tua banana, figlio di…

translation.en: No, no, no, no! No. That… that's not what we talked about.
translation.it: No! Non è quello che abbiamo concordato.

translation.en: -[groans] -[Ray] Boom! [laughing] Oh yeah!
-[Chuck] Nice, man. -[Ray] You crying, Reed?
Oh no, Chuck. Look, we made him cry. [Chuck] It's like he was trying to lose.
translation.it: - Oh, no, Chuck! L'abbiamo fatto piangere. - Non aveva speranze.

translation.en: Run away, Reed!
-What the hell? -I'm not supposed to do this.
Ever hear the expression, "Every bully has a bully"?
translation.it: Ma sapevi che ogni bullo ha il suo bullo?

translation.en: Yours isn't holding up his end of the bargain, so I'm gonna take over.
translation.it: Il tuo non si fa avanti, quindi ci penserò io.

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -[shushes]
You're a good fighter. You like to kick ass. You're a big kid.
translation.it: Sei bravo con le mani. Ti piace fare male. Sei grosso.

translation.en: But if you go near Adam again, I'll know, and I will find you, Ray.
translation.it: Ma se ti avvicini di nuovo ad Adam io lo scoprirò e ti troverò.

translation.en: And it won't be like a couple of kids in a playground scrap.
translation.it: E non saremo due ragazzini in un parco giochi.

translation.en: I will pull bones out of your body.
translation.it: Ti strapperò le ossa dal corpo.

translation.en: I will sharpen them.
-I will use them to stab little Chuckie. -What did I do?
translation.it: - E ci pugnalerò il piccolo Chuckie. - Che ho fatto, io?

translation.en: Shut your mouth, or I'll fill it with Ray's feet.
translation.it: Chiudi la bocca o ti ci infilo i piedi di Ray.

translation.en: You understand what I'm saying? Got all of it? The bones?
translation.it: Hai capito, Ray? - Le ossa, i piedi nella bocca di Chuckie? - Sì.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Your feet in Chuckie's mouth?
translation.it: - Le ossa, i piedi nella bocca di Chuckie? - Sì.

translation.en: -[liquid running] -Good. Are you peeing right now? -Yeah. -You're a real streamer.
translation.it: Bene. Stai facendo pipì? Bel fiotto.

translation.en: Get yourself home and clean yourself up.
translation.it: Torna a casa e datti una ripulita.

translation.en: Be the change you wanna see, okay?
translation.it: Sii il cambiamento che vuoi vedere.

translation.en: God, I hated those assholes.
Oh, come on.
Hey, Adam.
Get out of my stuff and open the door. Put the drone down. It will kill us both.
translation.it: Lascia stare la mia roba e apri la porta. Metti giù il drone. Ci ucciderà entrambi.

translation.en: Hey, look, you lost one fight. I figured you'd be used to that by now.
translation.it: Ehi, hai perso. Credevo ci fossi già abituato.

translation.en: You coulda helped. You just stood there.
translation.it: Avresti potuto aiutarmi. Non l'hai fatto.

translation.en: Christ. You're so sensitive.
Hey, you had to lose that fight.
You had to. Trust me.
You don't go from bein' you to bein' me without gettin' your ass kicked, a lot, all the time.
translation.it: Non passi dall'essere te all'essere me senza prenderle in continuazione.

translation.en: I'm sorry if I went too far today.
translation.it: Scusa se mi sono spinto troppo oltre.

translation.en: Shouldn't have done that.
-[young Adam] Who's this? -Who's who?
Put that back. You put that back.
As soon as you tell me who she is.
translation.it: Non appena mi dici chi è.

translation.en: That's my wife, Laura.
We have a wife?
No, we do not have a wife anymore.
-[Ellie] Hey. -Hi.
-[man] Aah. Hi, there. How are you? -Hey, Paul.
[Paul] Been a while. [Ellie] Yep, how you doin'? That baby sleeping yet?
translation.it: - Ne è passato di tempo. - È vero. Come va? Il bimbo dorme?

translation.en: Uh, not really. No. [chuckles] No. Well, you'll miss those days when they're gone.
translation.it: - Non proprio. No. - Beh, quei giorni ti mancheranno.

translation.en: Ah, I find that hard to believe.
[Ellie] Believe it. Babies are pure love.
translation.it: Credici, invece. I bambini sono amore puro.

translation.en: They grow into teenagers, who grow into be assassins of happiness.
translation.it: Poi, da adolescenti, diventano assassini di felicità.

translation.en: Thank you, thank you.
Mm, well, somethin' to look forward to. [chuckles]
Sorry. It's been a rough day.
translation.it: Scusa, è stata una giornata pesante.

translation.en: Year. Couple of years.
translation.it: Un anno pesante. O anche due.

translation.en: Hmm. Your boy still havin' a hard time?
He hates me.
It's not his fault. He's… he's just dealing.
translation.it: Non è colpa sua. Cerca di affrontare la situazione.

translation.en: It's fine. We'll be fine. It's good. Good, good, good.
translation.it: Va bene così, andrà tutto bene. Va tutto bene.

translation.en: I wish I knew what I was doin' wrong. You're not doin' anything wrong.
translation.it: - Vorrei solo sapere dove sbaglio. - Non sbagli affatto.

translation.en: Sorry. [laughs]
-I'm sorry. -[laughing] Sorry, you scared me.
-I was eavesdropping. I'm sorry. -Yeah.
[chuckles] You're right, though. Teenage boys are horrible.
translation.it: È vero, gli adolescenti sono terribili.

translation.en: It's like living with a urinal cake that yells at you.
translation.it: È come vivere con una puzzola che ti urla contro.

translation.en: Mothers are usually the ones who take the hit.
translation.it: E di solito è la madre a incassare.

translation.en: Yeah.
-But I'll tell you somethin'. -Mmm?
Boys always come back for their mamas.
translation.it: I ragazzi tornano sempre dalla mamma.

translation.en: That's nice.
It sounds like you're speaking from experience.
I am.
You have a good mom?
-[Adam] I do. -Oh.
[whispers] I have the best mom.
Good.
I hope you're right.
I'm still researching boarding schools in Fallujah, so…
translation.it: Non ho ancora scartato il collegio a Fallujah, quindi…

translation.en: -Good. -[both laugh]
No, I don't mean that. He's such a sweet kid.
translation.it: No, non dicevo sul serio. È un bambino dolcissimo.

translation.en: I'm crazy about him.
We lost his dad in a car accident year before last.
translation.it: Ha perso il padre in un incidente circa un anno fa.

translation.en: Yeah. That's tough.
Yeah. You have no idea.
Well, I have some idea.
-Oh, sorry. -Sorry.
Jinx.
-Thank you. -[Adam] Thank you.
translation.it: - L'abbiamo detto insieme. - Grazie. A te.

translation.en: Aren't you grieving too?
translation.it: Non sei in lutto anche tu?

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Adam] Yeah.
I am. Of course I am.
translation.it: Lo sono. Certo che lo sono.

translation.en: So tell him.
You should tell him.
I don't think he needs it.
You think you're being strong for him,
translation.it: Credi di essere forte per lui,

translation.en: and the problem with acting like you have it all together is…
translation.it: ma il problema, quando si finge di star bene,

translation.en: he believes it.
Maybe he needs to know that you don't.
translation.it: Forse deve sapere che non è vero.

translation.en: It's okay if you don't.
My husband had a jacket just like that.
translation.it: Mio marito aveva una giacca come la tua.

translation.en: Oh, this is a classic.
Yeah.
It was really nice chatting with you. I'll see you later.
translation.it: È stato un piacere chiacchierare con te. Ci vediamo.

translation.en: Oh, hey, um…
he doesn't hate you.
He loves you.
More than he knows.
Hey! Hey!
Locked and docked.
Start the area scans for his jet. Let's find him and get the hell outta here.
translation.it: Avvia la scansione per cercare il jet. Troviamolo e andiamocene da qui.

translation.en: Find him.
-So you came back for your wife, Laura? -We're not getting into that.
translation.it: - Sei tornato per tua moglie, Laura? - Non parliamone.

translation.en: Hey, she's my wife too.
-You know what? We should get into that. -Thank you.
translation.it: - Sai che c'è? Dovremmo parlarne. - Grazie.

translation.en: Met in the academy.
She was 20 minutes late to the wrong classroom
translation.it: Era in ritardo di 20 minuti, nell'aula sbagliata

translation.en: in the wrong building.
I offered to walk her to the right one, and…
translation.it: Mi sono offerto di accompagnarla in quello giusto

translation.en: man, I was all in before we even made it outside.
translation.it: ed ero totalmente cotto ancora prima di uscire.

translation.en: A couple of years ago, she didn't come back from a jump.
translation.it: Un paio di anni fa non è tornata da un salto.

translation.en: They told me her jet broke up on reentry, but she was the best pilot in the program.
translation.it: Dicono che ha avuto problemi al rientro, ma era la pilota migliore di tutti.

translation.en: She wrote the book on reentry. Didn't make sense.
translation.it: Ci ha scritto un libro, sul rientro. Non aveva senso.

translation.en: And you were trying to get to 2018 'cause that's where she went before?
translation.it: E volevi tornare nel 2018 perché è lì che era andata?

translation.en: Yeah.
-What was she doing there? -I don't know.
translation.it: - Che ci faceva lì? - Non lo so.

translation.en: They changed the jump logs. Somebody was hidin' somethin'.
translation.it: Hanno modificato i registri. Qualcuno nasconde qualcosa.

translation.en: Maybe she saw something Sorian didn't want her to see.
translation.it: Forse ha visto qualcosa che Sorian non voleva.

translation.en: Wait, "Sorian"? Maya Sorian, Dad's partner?
translation.it: Aspetta, Sorian? Maya Sorian, la socia di papà?

translation.en: -She was always so nice to me. -Hmm.
Yeah, trust me. She's no friend.
translation.it: Già. Fidati, non è amica tua.

translation.en: Nope.
After Dad died, she got rich off of his tech.
translation.it: Si è arricchita con la tecnologia di papà.

translation.en: Bought all the right people.
Next thing you know, she has exclusive control over the most valuable resource on Earth,
translation.it: e ha ottenuto il controllo esclusivo della risorsa più preziosa al mondo,

translation.en: time.
Wait a minute. You're saying Dad invented time travel?
translation.it: Aspetta un attimo. Papà ha inventato i viaggi nel tempo?

translation.en: Yeah. Not on purpose.
translation.it: Sì. Anche se non di proposito.

translation.en: The magnetic particle accelerator. Remember that?
translation.it: Hai presente l'acceleratore di particelle magnetico?

translation.en: He called it The Adam Project.
[Adam] Yeah, or as I like to call it, his favorite child.
translation.it: O, come lo chiamo io, il suo figlio prediletto.

translation.en: So what happened to Laura?
Mmm. Well, I think your nice friend Maya had her killed.
translation.it: La tua amica Maya l'ha fatta uccidere.

translation.en: -What? -Yeah.
That's why I gotta get back to 2018 as soon as possible.
The jet's almost ready. I'll lay low in the shed.
translation.it: Aspetterò che il jet sia pronto nel capanno.

translation.en: I'll heal for a few more days until I can get a clean read and then fly out of your life.
translation.it: Mi curerò finché non sarò autorizzato e volerò via dalla tua vita.

translation.en: But going back to save her. -Talking to me. -[whines]
translation.it: Tornare indietro per salvarla, parlare con me…

translation.en: Everything you're doing right now just to rescue one person.
translation.it: Stai facendo tutto questo per salvare una sola persona.

translation.en: You're changing the future. That's gotta be against the rules.
translation.it: Stai cambiando il futuro. Dev'essere contro le regole.

translation.en: You'll feel differently when you meet her.
-And when you lose her. -What?
[shushes] Grab that bag. Get ready to run.
translation.it: Che c'è? Prendi la borsa. E preparati a correre.

translation.en: Why? What's happening?
We're going that way. Be ready.
translation.it: Andiamo da quella parte. Tieniti pronto.

translation.en: -Move! -[whooshing]
Stay behind me. [exhales]
Don't you do it! Don't you do it, Reed!
Wanna see something cool?
-That's a lightsaber, dude. -Quiet now.
Time to go. Let's go.
[Sorian] Hello, Adam.
[man] Reed, don't move!
[Adam] Christos. They'll let anyone into this time stream.
translation.it: Christos. Fanno entrare chiunque in questa linea temporale.

translation.en: Who's that?
That's Christos. We were in the academy together.
translation.it: Quello è Christos. Eravamo in accademia insieme.

translation.en: He's a decent pilot but a terrible person.
He runs security for Sorian.
Ouchie, with the face. Did I do that?
translation.it: La faccia deve farti male. Colpa mia?

translation.en: God, I hope the boss lets me kill you.
translation.it: Spero che il capo mi permetta di ucciderti.

translation.en: [chuckles] In fairness, though, you did shoot me first.
translation.it: Mi hai sparato tu per primo.

translation.en: On the bright side, your… your face now matches your soul.
translation.it: Di buono c'è che ora il fuori rispecchia il dentro.

translation.en: -Anyone say you talk too much? -All the time.
translation.it: - Ti hanno detto che parli troppo? - Sì.

translation.en: -It's come up. -[Sorian] That's enough.
Adam, before this goes any further, let's just go home, please.
translation.it: Adam, prima di spingerci oltre, torniamo a casa. Per favore.

translation.en: Uh, no! Just… just no.
So you're risking your own young life
translation.it: Vuoi rischiare la vita del tuo sé più giovane

translation.en: over some paranoid delusion that I somehow killed Laura.
translation.it: per la folle idea paranoica che io abbia ucciso Laura.

translation.en: I loved Laura. You were both like family to me.
translation.it: Volevo bene a Laura. Eravate parte della famiglia, per me.

translation.en: I would never have hurt her. I hate that it's come to this.
translation.it: Non le avrei mai fatto del male. Odio essere arrivati a tanto.

translation.en: Guns.
Christos, please escort Adam back to 2050.
translation.it: Per favore, Christos, scorta Adam nel 2050.

translation.en: -You're up. -Yeah. All right, drop the Mag-Cyl.
translation.it: - Tocca a te. - Già. Molla il MagCyl.

translation.en: -This? -Yeah.
-Yeah. Okay. -All right.
Wanna start low or go high?
-[young Adam] Stop! Get off him! -[Adam groans]
-[guns power up] -[Christos] Come here!
-Move! -♪ I was told what it means ♪
-What is happening? -Dying outside your fixed time is messy.
translation.it: Che succede? Meglio non morire fuori dal proprio tempo.

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -Saving your ass, honey. Behind you!
translation.it: - Che ci fai qui? - Ti salvo il culo, amore. Dietro di te!

translation.en: I can't believe…
-I can't believe you're here. -♪ Good times, bad times ♪
-Hey. -Hi.
That was awesome.
-We should go. -Yep. Let's go. Come on, come on, come on!
Go. Go!
I knew you'd come someday. I just didn't know when.
translation.it: Sapevo che saresti venuto, ma non quando.

translation.en: [Adam] Of course I came. [young Adam] Eyes on the road, please.
translation.it: - Ma certo. - Guarda la strada, per favore.

translation.en: [Adam] They said you lit up on reentry.
translation.it: Hanno detto che hai sbagliato il rientro.

translation.en: That's crap. I have the top reentry stats in the program.
translation.it: Cazzate. Ho le statistiche migliori del programma.

translation.en: -Oh yeah. -[young Adam coughing]
Laura, this is… me.
-Hi. -Parallel contact, babe?
Well, you've always said that you wished you'd met me earlier.
translation.it: Dici sempre che avresti voluto conoscermi prima, eccomi.

translation.en: -Here I am. -Yeah.
translation.it: Dici sempre che avresti voluto conoscermi prima, eccomi. Sì.

translation.en: All right, can we maybe slow down a bit now? There's no one even following us.
translation.it: Ok, possiamo rallentare? Nessuno ci segue.

translation.en: Don't look back. Look up.
translation.it: Non guardare indietro, ma in alto.

translation.en: [Adam] Gotta get off this road. We're too exposed.
translation.it: Lasciamo la strada, siamo troppo esposti.

translation.en: Okay, baby, it's about to get busier.
Go, go, go, go, go, go, go!
Stop the car.
-What? -What?
-Stop! -[Laura yells]
Okay, back, back. Go, go, go! Reverse!
Back! Back!
Go, go, go, go!
They're leaving.
They're not leaving. They're regrouping.
translation.it: Non se ne vanno. Si stanno riorganizzando.

translation.en: -We have to get off this road fast. -[young Adam] What road?
translation.it: - Dobbiamo levarci da questa strada. - Che strada?

translation.en: [Adam] I… I don't understand. How did you find us?
translation.it: Non capisco. Come ci hai trovati?

translation.en: [Laura] You don't think I'd be watching your back, even in the past?
translation.it: Credi che non ti guarderei le spalle, anche nel passato?

translation.en: [Adam] Why did you make the jump back in the first place?
I was analyzing data when I found something strange in the jump logs.
translation.it: Ho trovato qualcosa di strano nel registro dei salti.

translation.en: A time jet returning from 2018.
translation.it: Un jet temporale di ritorno dal 2018.

translation.en: How's that strange?
Because no one ever flew to 2018.
[Adam] I don't get it. How did it come back if it never left?
translation.it: Come ha fatto a tornare, se non è mai partito?

translation.en: Unless someone went back and altered the time stream,
translation.it: A meno che qualcuno non abbia alterato la linea temporale,

translation.en: so the future the jet had left from had already been changed.
translation.it: quindi il futuro da cui è partito era già stato cambiato.

translation.en: God, it's like I traded my brains for those muscles.
translation.it: Dio, è come aver barattato il cervello coi muscoli.

translation.en: It's a shit deal.
-Cute kid. -Precious, isn't he?
Don't you just wanna hold him underwater till the bubbles stop?
translation.it: Non vuoi tenerlo sott'acqua finché le bolle non si fermano?

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Oh, I freakin' hate myself.
How did this happen?
[Laura] That jet that went back? It was Sorian's.
translation.it: Il jet che è tornato indietro era di Sorian.

translation.en: She went back to November 2018 for a reason.
translation.it: È tornata nel novembre 2018 per un motivo.

translation.en: What happened in November 2018?
I'll tell ya. [sighs]
This happened.
Your father's magnetic particle accelerator,
translation.it: L'acceleratore di particelle di tuo padre,

translation.en: The Adam Project, had just gone online.
translation.it: il Progetto Adam, era appena stato attivato.

translation.en: That was the first step toward practical time travel.
translation.it: Fu il primo passo verso i viaggi nel tempo.

translation.en: Sorian must've come back to 2018
and given her younger self some kind of future intel.
translation.it: per dare a se stessa informazioni sul futuro.

translation.en: What for?
My guess is enough future stock tips to amass her fortune
translation.it: Direi consigli di investimento per accumulare una fortuna

translation.en: and get rid of whatever political obstacles
were keeping her from gaining control of the time program.
translation.it: che le impedivano di controllare il programma.

translation.en: She already had that. But did she?
translation.it: - Ma aveva già queste cose. - Ne siamo certi?

translation.en: No, she didn't.
No.
So this world, our world, everything has already been changed by Sorian.
translation.it: Questo mondo, il nostro mondo… Tutto è già stato cambiato da Sorian.

translation.en: And your fixed time, 2050, is it bad there?
translation.it: E nel tuo tempo, il 2050, le cose vanno male?

translation.en: -We've seen Terminator, right? -Obviously.
That's 2050 on a good day.
Sorian must've spotted me and planted an altitude bomb on my jet.
translation.it: Sorian deve avermi vista e ha piazzato una bomba sul mio jet.

translation.en: Here, eat something.
-I managed to eject, but it didn't matter. -[mouths] Without my jet, I was a permanent castaway.
translation.it: Sono riuscita a uscire, ma non importava, perché senza jet non potevo tornare.

translation.en: So I had to follow protocol, you know, live out my life here,
translation.it: Quindi ho dovuto seguire il protocollo, vivere la mia vita qui,

translation.en: avoid contact, minimize my footprint,
translation.it: evitare i contatti, non influire sugli eventi

translation.en: and hope you were crazy enough to come look for me.
translation.it: e sperare che fossi abbastanza folle da cercarmi.

translation.en: Alone. All this time.
translation.it: Da sola. Per tutto questo tempo.

translation.en: Four years.
That's the job, right?
-Yeah, but, baby-- -It's…
It's fine. I got used to being alone.
translation.it: Va bene. Mi sono abituata a stare da sola.

translation.en: Not anymore.
-[sighs] -[Adam] Hey.
I found you.
-[Laura chuckles] -I found you.
You found me.
-I'll take my eyes and ears for a walk. -[Adam] Bye now.
translation.it: - Porto via occhi e orecchie. - Ciao.

translation.en: [young Adam] You kids have fun.
-[sighs] Hey. -Hi.
-What's wrong? -I got shot.
-You got shot? -By a gun, yeah.
translation.it: - Ti hanno sparato? - Con una pistola.

translation.en: -Reed? -Yeah?
-Suck it up. -Yes, ma'am.
-You know what you have to do. -Nooooo. No, I came back for you.
translation.it: - Sai cosa devi fare. - No. Sono tornato per te.

translation.en: I know.
But we can't have a life here. Not like this.
translation.it: Ma non possiamo vivere qui. Non così.

translation.en: Now you have to go back to 2018, and you have to put things right.
translation.it: Devi tornare nel 2018 e sistemare le cose.

translation.en: -You have to put an end to all this. -What do you mean "put an end to it"?
translation.it: - Porre fine a tutto questo. - In che senso?

translation.en: I mean, stop time travel from ever being invented and save the future.
translation.it: Bisogna impedire che i viaggi nel tempo siano inventati e salvare il futuro.

translation.en: Fine, come with me, and we'll--
Your jet is meshed for your DNA. It won't fly with anyone else.
translation.it: Il jet riconosce il tuo DNA. Non volerà con me.

translation.en: -You're smart. You can figure it out. -Adam!
We meet in the program. We meet there. Do you understand that? We can't…
translation.it: Noi ci incontriamo nel programma. Lo capisci? Non possiamo…

translation.en: If I go back and stop time travel,
translation.it: Se impedisco i viaggi nel tempo, il che è da vedere,

translation.en: and that's an extremely big "if" with Sorian on my ass,
translation.it: Se impedisco i viaggi nel tempo, il che è da vedere, con Sorian che mi sta addosso,

translation.en: we never meet.
We never happen.
We never happen, Laura.
We did happen.
Every moment we ever had will always have happened.
translation.it: Ogni momento che abbiamo vissuto è reale.

translation.en: Even if we correct the time stream,
translation.it: Anche se correggiamo la linea temporale,

translation.en: somewhere in us will be the echo of this one.
translation.it: dentro di noi ci sarà l'eco di questa.

translation.en: And we will find each other.
I really believe that.
What if we don't? What if… what if you're wrong? And you're probably wrong.
translation.it: E se non fosse così? E se ti sbagliassi? E probabilmente ti sbagli.

translation.en: When am I ever wrong?
-Hey, hey. -[sobs] I can't do this again, okay?
translation.it: Ehi. Non posso farlo di nuovo, ok?

translation.en: I can't do this again, please. I can't afford to lose you. Don't do this.
translation.it: Non posso farlo di nuovo, ti prego. Non posso perderti.

translation.en: What is that?
They found us.
[gasping] Damn it!
There's a dirt road around the bend.
translation.it: C'è una strada, qui dietro. Vi darò il tempo di arrivare al jet.

translation.en: -I'll buy you time to get to your jet. -No, no, no. Hey. I'm not leaving.
translation.it: C'è una strada, qui dietro. Vi darò il tempo di arrivare al jet. No, io non me ne vado.

translation.en: -You have to. -What are you talking about?
translation.it: - Devi farlo. - Ma che dici? Ti uccideranno.

translation.en: -Those guys'll kill you. -No! I've had years--
translation.it: - Devi farlo. - Ma che dici? Ti uccideranno. Preparo le mie difese da anni. Li prenderò alla sprovvista.

translation.en: I've had years to rig my defenses. They'll never see me coming.
translation.it: Preparo le mie difese da anni. Li prenderò alla sprovvista.

translation.en: -If they catch you, it's over. -That's the only reason--
translation.it: - Se ti prendono, è finita. - Ma è…

translation.en: Adam! Stop it! Please. [sobs]
I know you came for me.
translation.it: So che sei venuto per me.

translation.en: [sobbing] Now you have to leave for me, please.
translation.it: Ora devi andartene per me, ti prego.

translation.en: Please.
[whispers] We can fix this.
Hey, I love you.
That's why I know you're gonna find me again.
translation.it: Per questo so che mi troverai di nuovo.

translation.en: Go.
Go!
God damn it!
Come on.
Come on.
[Adam] Jet's not reading me because of my vitals. I'll need your DNA to start her up.
translation.it: Il jet non mi accetta per la ferita. Mi serve il tuo DNA.

translation.en: When we get to altitude, the bio stop will come down, and then I can take over.
translation.it: Una volta in quota potrò subentrare io.

translation.en: We have to move fast, or they'll be on us before we can jump to 2018.
translation.it: Dobbiamo sbrigarci o ci prenderanno prima di saltare nel 2018.

translation.en: -Wait. What? I'm not coming with you. -Yes, you are. Let's go. We need to go.
translation.it: Cosa? Io non vengo. Sì, invece. Dobbiamo andare.

translation.en: [Laura] Christos!
-[panting] -It's good to see you, buddy.
Laura, is that you?
You're not still mad at me for blowing up your jet, are you?
translation.it: Non ce l'hai con me per averti fatto esplodere il jet, vero?

translation.en: If I'm being honest, yeah, I'm still kinda pissed.
translation.it: A essere sincera, sì, sono ancora un po' incazzata.

translation.en: Will you stop and listen to me?
This is my fixed time. You already had my childhood.
translation.it: Questo è il mio Tempo Stabilito. Tu l'hai già vissuto.

translation.en: You had adventures, you flew planes,
and I'm still the nerd with an inhaler who gets his ass kicked.
translation.it: Io sono ancora il nerd asmatico pieno di lividi.

translation.en: I want the rest of it.
-Want the rest? -Yeah.
Here's the rest of it. Dad's death screws you up more than you ever realize.
translation.it: Eccolo. La morte di papà ti rovina più di quanto pensi.

translation.en: You get depressed. You get angry.
You wander around school without making a social dent.
translation.it: Vai a scuola senza legare con nessuno.

translation.en: College is a high point, until after a year, you lose your scholarship
translation.it: Il college va bene, finché non perdi la borsa di studio

translation.en: for something that is so unbelievably stupid I cannot even say it out loud right now.
translation.it: per una cosa talmente stupida che non voglio neanche dirla ad alta voce.

translation.en: You end up in the air force. Turns out you could really fly.
translation.it: Entri nell'aeronautica. A quanto pare, sei bravo a volare.

translation.en: And then along comes time travel, and the whole world starts to fall apart
translation.it: Poi arrivano i viaggi nel tempo e il mondo va in rovina,

translation.en: until the only woman you have…
the only woman you ever loved gets taken away. Do you understand me?
translation.it: L'unica donna che hai mai amato ti viene portata via. Mi capisci?

translation.en: Till you lose…
She… she just gets taken away.
-There's gotta be more than that. -[Adam] There is, kid.
translation.it: Dev'esserci dell'altro. C'è, ragazzo. E, grazie a Sorian, non è niente di buono.

translation.en: And thanks to Sorian, none of it's good.
translation.it: C'è, ragazzo. E, grazie a Sorian, non è niente di buono.

translation.en: We can fix it.
-By destroying time travel? -That's right.
translation.it: - Distruggendo i viaggi nel tempo? - Sì.

translation.en: How are we gonna do that? What's your plan?
translation.it: E come? Qual è il piano?

translation.en: I'm not gonna explain my plan to a nerd with an inhaler--
translation.it: Non spiegherò il mio piano a un nerd asmatico…

translation.en: -You don't have a plan. -Because I do not have a plan. -Exactly. -That is correct.
translation.it: - Non hai un piano. - Non ho un piano. Esatto.

translation.en: But I know somebody who might.
translation.it: No, ma so chi potrebbe averlo.

translation.en: Dad.
Dad.
You're gonna find Dad. [Adam] Nope.
We're gonna find Dad.
So are you in or are you--
Tell your husband to get his bitch ass out here.
translation.it: Di' a tuo marito di portare il culo qui.

translation.en: He's busy right now, but I'll tell him you stopped by.
translation.it: Ora è impegnato, ma gli dirò che sei passato.

translation.en: Hello, Laura.
You should have stayed dead the first time.
Now, where is your husband?
[Adam panting] Okay.
Here we go. All right, give me your hand.
-[whirring] -Like that, yep.
Nice, healthy DNA right there.
Okay, we'll park it down there,
grab on to that railing, hold on for dear life, and try not to pass out from the G's, okay?
translation.it: tieniti forte e cerca di non svenire per la forza G.

translation.en: What's a… Jesus!
-What's happening? -That.
[young Adam yelps] What are you doing?
Gotcha!
I told you to hang on.
Don't give me that stink eye.
Where you going?
Shit!
[Adam] Okay, hold tight. I've always wanted to try this.
translation.it: Ok, tieniti. Ho sempre voluto provarci.

translation.en: [young Adam] Did you just turn the plane off?
[Adam] Yes, I did.
[young Adam] Oh my God, oh my God, oh my God, oh my God, oh my God,
oh my God, oh my God, oh my God, oh my God, oh my God,
Where the hell are they?
-[Christos] They gotta be here somewhere. -[Sorian] Adam, check your ion readings.
translation.it: - Devono essere qui intorno. - Adam, dai un'occhiata ai tuoi valori.

translation.en: The reactor's damaged.
You have one jump left.
If you don't come back now, you never will.
translation.it: Se non torni adesso, non tornerai mai più.

translation.en: What do you say, kid? Your call.
We don't pull this off, we're not gettin' back, either one of us.
translation.it: Se non ci riusciamo, nessuno di noi tornerà indietro.

translation.en: -Punch that shit. -Oh yeah!
Gotcha.
-♪ Well, my temperature's rising… ♪ -Come on!
-♪ Crazy people knockin'… ♪ -Adam! I got this.
Come on, Reed. Come on.
-[young Adam] Adam! -[Adam] I got it! -Adam! -I got it!
-[young Adam] Adam! -♪ So glad we made it… ♪
Come on!
-Let's not… -[alarm bleeping]
Die!
[man] It's not meant to be easy.
Listen, guys, instead of moaning about it,
give yourself permission to be inadequate, and then get to work.
translation.it: concedetevi di essere inadeguati e poi mettetevi al lavoro.

translation.en: You can't be good at something unless you're willing to be… -[blows raspberry] …at it first. -[laughter]
translation.it: Non sarete mai bravi in qualcosa se prima non siete disposti a fare schifo.

translation.en: -Professor Reed. -Sophie.
It'll take two semesters just to begin solving that.
translation.it: Ci vorranno due semestri per risolverlo.

translation.en: [Louis] Oh, good God, at least that.
[Sophie] Even then, we'll fail the class, because this is bonkers.
translation.it: E probabilmente saremo bocciati, perché è una follia.

translation.en: [Louis] Sophie, you can do this.
Listen, guys, that is the beauty of physics.
translation.it: Ascoltate, ragazzi, è questo il bello della fisica.

translation.en: [voice fading] That is the beauty of life…
translation.it: È questo il bello della vita.

translation.en: It's really him.
-Yep. -[Louis] If you think you've got…
He's so…
[Adam] Yeah.
Alive. Come here for a second. Hey.
-Let me do the talking in there. -We have to tell him what happens.
translation.it: Lascia parlare me. - Dobbiamo dirglielo. Non deve morire. - Non possiamo.

translation.en: -He doesn't have to die. -We say nothing, okay?
translation.it: - Dobbiamo dirglielo. Non deve morire. - Non possiamo.

translation.en: Only what he needs to know. Everything else… we can't.
translation.it: Gli diremo ciò che deve sapere. Tutto il resto… Non possiamo.

translation.en: I wanna hear you say it, "I won't tell him." Say it.
translation.it: Voglio sentirti dire: "Non glielo dirò". Dillo.

translation.en: -Say it. -I won't tell him.
Physics is a slog. It's a slog.
We are meant to work on problems that our children will solve.
translation.it: Dobbiamo lavorare sui problemi che i nostri figli risolveranno.

translation.en: You might find the odd solution here or there.
translation.it: Potreste trovare qualche soluzione, qui e là.

translation.en: I just got your shirt, by the way. It's very clever.
translation.it: Ho appena capito il tuo maglione. Molto sagace.

translation.en: But you will die before your life's work is done.
translation.it: Ma tutti voi morirete prima che il vostro lavoro sia finito.

translation.en: Your cold, lifeless husk will be moldering in the ground
translation.it: La vostra salma gelida ammuffirà sottoterra

translation.en: while generations that come after you will be finishing the work that you started.
translation.it: mentre le generazioni che verranno finiranno il lavoro che avete iniziato.

translation.en: To quote the Romans,
"Enjoy yourselves. It's later than you think."
translation.it: "Divertitevi. È più tardi di quanto crediate".

translation.en: [Adam] Guy Lombardo.
-I am s… I'm sorry? -[Adam] Guy Lombardo. That was… Yeah.
The quote, um… "It's later than you think." It's not the Romans.
translation.it: La citazione. Non è dei romani.

translation.en: It's a singer. Guy Lombardo and his Royal Canadians.
translation.it: È di un cantante. Guy Lombardo e i Royal Canadian.

translation.en: It was Guy Lombardo, and it was from his 1949 classic, "Enjoy Yourself."
translation.it: L'ha detto Guy Lombardo nel classico del '49 "Enjoy Yourself".

translation.en: But long before that,
it was the Romans who etched it on their sundials.
translation.it: furono i romani a inciderlo sulle loro meridiane.

translation.en: So, uh… so we're both right. It's interesting that you, uh… you know that.
translation.it: Abbiamo ragione entrambi. È curioso che tu lo sappia.

translation.en: I'm sorry, do I know you?
Just auditing the class. [chuckles]
Any other questions?
All right, the, uh, reading's on my website, and I'll see you Tuesday.
translation.it: Bene, il materiale è sul mio sito web. Ci vediamo martedì.

translation.en: Dad.
Dad.
[Louis] Adam?
Is… is this time travel?
-[Louis] He came from 2050 and got you? -[young Adam] Yes.
translation.it: È tornato dal 2050 e ha trovato te. Sì.

translation.en: -How old are you now? -[young Adam] Twelve.
-Why did you need your 12-year-old self? -[Adam] I didn't.
translation.it: - Perché ti serviva lui? - Non mi serviva.

translation.en: -You needed me to fly the jet. -Jet? There… there's a jet?
translation.it: - Ti servivo per pilotare il jet. - Jet? C'è un jet?

translation.en: -My jet. -Oh. What I meant was I didn't need you originally.
translation.it: Il mio jet. Intendevo che non sono qui per te.

translation.en: -2022 was a mistake. -Wh--
And you flew this jet?
translation.it: - E tu hai pilotato questo jet? - Sì.

translation.en: -Yes. -Did you, though?
translation.it: - E tu hai pilotato questo jet? - Sì. Ne sei sicuro?

translation.en: -Is that my jacket? Looks tight on you. -That's what I said.
translation.it: - È la mia giacca? Ti va stretta. - Lo dicevo.

translation.en: -It's fine. -Like a condom with buttons.
-This is fun. I'm having fun, are you? -Condom!
And why was 2022 a mistake?
translation.it: Perché il 2022 è stato un errore?

translation.en: -I wasn't supposed to be there. -You're not supposed to be here.
translation.it: - Non dovevo finire lì. - Beh, neanche qui.

translation.en: -You don't say. -They shot him when he stole the jet.
translation.it: - Ma dai? - Gli hanno sparato mentre rubava il jet.

translation.en: -Please don't tell him that. -You stole a jet?
-Why would he need to know that? -Okay, stop. Both of you stop talking now.
translation.it: - Perché deve saperlo? - Ok, basta. Ora smettete di parlare.

translation.en: Do you realize how absolutely wrong this is?
translation.it: Ti rendi conto di quanto sia sbagliato?

translation.en: You can't be here. You can't be anywhere but your own timeline.
translation.it: Non dovete stare qui, ma nella vostra linea temporale.

translation.en: What do you think we're doin' here? Think we're short of hugs in the future?
translation.it: Perché credi che siamo qui? Perché ci andava un abbraccio?

translation.en: -There's a reason I need to talk to you. -I don't-- I don't care.
-He doesn't care. -Don't get me wrong.
translation.it: - Non gli interessa. - Cerca di capire.

translation.en: I'm very happy to see you, and I mean this in the best possible way,
translation.it: Sono felice di vedervi e ve lo dico con il cuore,

translation.en: but you need to piss off to where you came from.
translation.it: ma dovete tornare da dove siete venuti.

translation.en: Anything you say or do could cause a divergence.
translation.it: Qualsiasi cosa diciate o facciate potrebbe cambiare tutto.

translation.en: Can you please shut up for a second?
-I'm not gonna listen-- -For a second and listen.
translation.it: - No, non ti ascolterò… - Stammi a sentire.

translation.en: -Shut the physics fountain in your face. -What you are doing is reckless.
translation.it: - Chiudi quella bocca da scienziato. - Papà!

translation.en: [young Adam] You okay?
-God damn it! -[groaning]
-[Adam] In fairness, I-- -It's okay. I asked him nicely to shut up and listen.
translation.it: Gli ho chiesto gentilmente di stare zitto e ascoltare.

translation.en: -He did no such thing, so… -It's okay. It's fine. I'm fine.
translation.it: - Non l'ha fatto, quindi… - Va bene. Sto bene.

translation.en: That's what you get. We don't hit people in this family.
translation.it: Così impari. Non ci picchiamo, in questa famiglia.

translation.en: What was that?
-That's what you get. -God!
How did you turn out to be an asshole? I thought you loved me.
translation.it: Come sei diventato così? Credevo mi volessi bene.

translation.en: -I do! -None of it matters anymore.
-Are you kidding me? Of course it matters. -Dad.
translation.it: Scherzi? Certo che importa. - Papà. - Importa eccome.

translation.en: They don't have safeguards where you come from? -Dad. -Protocols?
translation.it: Non avete dei protocolli, nel futuro?

translation.en: -Maya and I agreed. -Dad. -There'd be an ethics panel-- -Dad!
With real oversight.
None of it matters anymore.
Wait. It already happened? Somebody already altered time?
translation.it: Aspetta. È già successo? Qualcuno ha già alterato il tempo?

translation.en: -Who? -Sorian.
-Maya? -Maya.
She'd never do that. She knows the consequences.
translation.it: Non lo farebbe mai, conosce le conseguenze.

translation.en: -She's been funding my work for years. -The Adam Project.
translation.it: - Mi finanzia da anni. - Il Progetto Adam.

translation.en: Yes, I theorized that with a powerful enough pulse,
translation.it: Sì, ho teorizzato che con un impulso abbastanza potente

translation.en: we could generate utilitarian wormholes in space.
And we did it four weeks ago.
But I was… I was just playing with the theory that you can use wormholes for time travel.
translation.it: Ma l'idea di usare i wormhole per viaggiare nel tempo è solo una teoria.

translation.en: That part's theoretical.
-Right. -Still theoretical.
This theory needs to take a leak. So let's go.
Holy shit! I'm the godfather of time travel?
translation.it: Porca vacca! Sono il padrino dei viaggi nel tempo?

translation.en: Nice hit, Dad. [whispers] I think I broke my hand.
translation.it: - Bel colpo, papà. - Credo di essermi rotto la mano.

translation.en: [Louis] I'm… I'm sorry. This is my fault. My… my ego. My hubris.
translation.it: Mi dispiace. È colpa mia. Del mio ego. Della mia arroganza.

translation.en: My need to be best, to be first, to be the smartest guy in the room. And here we are.
translation.it: Devo sempre essere il migliore, il più intelligente. E ora eccoci qui.

translation.en: -A disgusting character flaw. -He didn't know.
translation.it: - Un orribile difetto. - Non lo sapevi.

translation.en: -[Louis] But I should have. -Yeah.
Mankind has no business tampering with the mechanics of the universe.
translation.it: L'umanità non deve interferire con le meccaniche dell'universo.

translation.en: There are forces greater than science.
translation.it: Ci sono forze più grandi della scienza.

translation.en: Right. That's why we're gonna put the genie back in the bottle.
translation.it: Esatto, perciò rimetteremo il genio nella bottiglia.

translation.en: Destroy time travel before it's even invented.
translation.it: Impediremo che il viaggio nel tempo venga creato.

translation.en: What's done, no matter how terrible,
translation.it: Ciò che è fatto, per quanto terribile,

translation.en: should not and cannot be undone under any circumstance.
translation.it: non deve e non può essere annullato in nessuna circostanza.

translation.en: Even us being here, talking like this, we're perverting fate and time.
translation.it: Anche solo stando qui stiamo cambiando il destino e il tempo.

translation.en: I told you Sorian already did that. She's had the world by the balls since.
translation.it: Sorian l'ha già fatto. E ora tiene il mondo per le palle.

translation.en: And you know that for a fact?
Do you have scientific proof that she changed things?
translation.it: Hai la prova che ha cambiato le cose?

translation.en: No, you don't because you can't know. But I will tell you this.
translation.it: No, perché non puoi saperlo. Ma ti dirò una cosa.

translation.en: You being here opens up the potential for catastrophic reconfiguration.
translation.it: Stando qui state creando il potenziale per una riconfigurazione catastrofica,

translation.en: -And that is quantifiable, that-- -Stop. Stop.
translation.it: e questo è quantificabile. - Smettila. - Di fare cosa?

translation.en: -Stop. -Stop what?
-Stop being a scientist. -But I am a scient--
translation.it: - Di fare lo scienziato. - Ma sono…

translation.en: Be a father.
You were always more interested in the universe than your son.
translation.it: Ti è sempre interessato dell'universo più che di tuo figlio.

translation.en: -That's not true. -[Adam] That is true.
And when you're older, you'll realize that. It--
translation.it: Quando sarai più grande lo capirai.

translation.en: You know what? It's…
That ship has sailed. It's too late for me. So, you know, whatever. I'm fine.
translation.it: La nave è salpata. Per me è tardi. Non importa. Sto bene.

translation.en: But he needs you.
translation.it: Ma lui ha bisogno di te.

translation.en: And you? What do you need?
translation.it: E tu? Di cosa hai bisogno?

translation.en: I need to go for a walk.
I can't be here, Adam. I… I have to go.
translation.it: Non posso stare qui, Adam. Devo andare.

translation.en: -Please don't go. -I have to.
-Please. -This is… this is bigger than any of us.
translation.it: - Ti prego. - È una cosa più grande di noi.

translation.en: It's too dangerous what he's asking me to do. I can't.
translation.it: È troppo pericoloso. Non posso farlo.

translation.en: All right. We'll see each other again.
Wait.
-I need to tell you something. -No, you can't say anything else to me.
translation.it: - Devo dirti una cosa. - No, non puoi dirmi nient'altro.

translation.en: I can't know the future.
I'm sorry.
I have to go home. Your mom and you are waiting.
translation.it: Devo tornare a casa da te e tua madre.

translation.en: [woman] Yes, Senator.
Except the stability of these wormholes is no longer a hypothetical,
translation.it: Ma la stabilità dei wormhole non è più solo ipotetica,

translation.en: and the work we are doing here is simply ahead of the current statutes.
translation.it: e il lavoro che facciamo qui va ben oltre gli standard attuali.

translation.en: So you can either support my program and be a part of the future,
translation.it: Quindi può sostenere il mio programma e fare parte del futuro

translation.en: or you can get left behind in the past.
translation.it: o può rimanere ancorato nel passato.

translation.en: [Sorian] Hang up the phone.
What are you doing here? You said I wouldn't be seeing you again.
translation.it: Che ci fai qui? Hai detto che non ti avrei più rivista.

translation.en: Did I? Hmm.
When was that? Remind me.
[Maya] The last time you just showed up, two months ago.
translation.it: L'ultima volta che sei venuta, due mesi fa.

translation.en: Oh, well, for me, it was 32 years ago.
translation.it: Oh, beh, per me sono passati 32 anni.

translation.en: So sorry if I'm a little fuzzy on the details.
translation.it: Perdonami se non ricordo bene i dettagli.

translation.en: Anyway, times have changed.
You can't be here.
You know the potential for catastrophic changes to the time stream.
translation.it: Sai che la linea temporale potrebbe subire cambiamenti catastrofici.

translation.en: -It's incalculable. -God, I was such a nerd.
Will you please just stop talking? Everything you asked me to do.
translation.it: - Vuoi tacere? - Ciò che mi hai chiesto di fare,

translation.en: The stock buys, the offshore accounts, all of it. It's unethical.
translation.it: l'acquisto di azioni, i conti offshore… Tutto quanto. È immorale.

translation.en: -And illegal. -This isn't a joke. It's dangerous.
translation.it: E illegale. Non è uno scherzo. È pericoloso.

translation.en: The environmental impact alone from the companies you had me pick
translation.it: L'impatto ambientale delle aziende che mi hai fatto scegliere

translation.en: could be devastating.
In fairness to us, the environment was pretty much toast before we came along.
translation.it: A dirla tutta, l'ambiente era condannato anche prima di noi.

translation.en: And by the way, Maya, you did it, all of it,
translation.it: E comunque, Maya, l'hai fatto lo stesso.

translation.en: because somewhere inside that cheap suit and ridiculous ponytail is me.
translation.it: Perché nonostante l'abito scadente e la ridicola coda di cavallo, tu sei me.

translation.en: I'm leaving.
Where you going?
You seeing someone? No, you're not. You're too busy.
translation.it: Ti vedi con qualcuno? No. Sei troppo occupata.

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Thing is, you always will be.
This company is all you will ever have.
translation.it: Quest'azienda è tutto ciò che hai.

translation.en: -[sighs] -It is your personal life.
It's your family.
But this is our legacy.
translation.it: Ma è anche la nostra eredità.

translation.en: And if we had let the government take it from us,
translation.it: E se avessimo lasciato che il governo ce la portasse via,

translation.en: then everything we sacrificed,
translation.it: tutti i sacrifici che abbiamo fatto,

translation.en: all that loneliness,
all that loneliness,
would've been for nothing.
And I did it.
I fixed that future where we had been forgotten.
translation.it: Ho sistemato il futuro in cui eravamo state dimenticate.

translation.en: Then why are you back here now?
I'm back
because we can't control time travel if it never existed.
translation.it: perché non possiamo controllare ciò che non è mai esistito.

translation.en: And your buddy Adam Reed is about to betray you.
translation.it: E il tuo amico Adam Reed sta per tradirti.

translation.en: Adam? He's just a little kid.
Yeah, well, that little kid…
[laughs] …he grows up to be a very big pain in our ass.
translation.it: cresce fino a diventare un'enorme seccatura.

translation.en: [sighs] Trust me. You're gonna want this.
What?
I know you think you know more than me because you're older.
translation.it: So che ti credi più saggio perché sei più grande.

translation.en: Go away, Adam. [sighs]
And I know why you hate him so much.
translation.it: E so perché lo odi così tanto.

translation.en: Really?
[laughs] Well, do tell. I'm on the edge of my seat here.
translation.it: Beh, dimmelo. Muoio dalla voglia di sentirlo.

translation.en: Holy shit. I wonder what it i-- Was it because he's narcissistic,
translation.it: Santo cielo, chissà… Forse perché è un narcisista

translation.en: or, uh, never came home from work or cared more about his job than his son--
