translation.it: o perché ha sempre preferito il lavoro a suo figlio…

translation.en: It's because he died.
You hate him
because he died.
You made yourself hate him
because it was easier than missing him.
translation.it: perché era più facile che sentirne la mancanza.

translation.en: And I remember some stuff that you maybe don't wanna.
translation.it: Io mi ricordo delle cose che forse hai rimosso.

translation.en: Oh yeah?
Like what?
He played catch with us almost every night.
translation.it: Giocava a palla con noi quasi tutte le sere.

translation.en: Catch.
He'd get home from work,
be so tired, and I'd be in the yard throwing the ball against the pitch back.
translation.it: era stanco morto e io ero in cortile a lanciare la palla contro la rete.

translation.en: -You remember the pitch back, right? -Oh, I… I remember the pitch back.
translation.it: Ricordi la rete, vero? Oh, mi ricordo della rete.

translation.en: Yeah, he bought it so he didn't have to play with me.
translation.it: Sì, l'ha comprata per non dover giocare con me.

translation.en: Nope.
He bought it because they had one in the window of Altman's.
translation.it: L'ha comprata perché Altman ne aveva una in vetrina.

translation.en: And every time we passed that store, I begged him to buy it for me,
translation.it: Ogni volta che passavamo di lì io lo pregavo di comprarmela,

translation.en: so that's what Dad did.
He'd see me throwin' in the yard, and no matter how tired he was,
translation.it: Mi vedeva giocare in cortile e per quanto fosse stanco

translation.en: he'd always grab his mitt to come out for a catch.
translation.it: prendeva il guantone e veniva a giocare con me.

translation.en: Things happened to you, to us.
translation.it: Sono successe delle cose. A te, a noi.

translation.en: And we suck at dealing with it.
I'm starting to think it's something we do.
I give Mom a hard time now, and…
translation.it: Io sfogo il mio dolore sulla mamma e…

translation.en: I think…
I think it's easier to be angry than it is to be sad.
translation.it: sia più facile essere arrabbiati che tristi.

translation.en: And I guess, when I get older,
translation.it: E immagino che quando sarò grande

translation.en: I forget that there's a difference.
How'd you get to be so smart?
translation.it: Come fai a essere così intelligente?

translation.en: How'd you get to be so dumb?
translation.it: Come fai a essere così stupido?

translation.en: Nice try, asshole.
[Ellie] Adam, make sure you feed Hawking before you leave for school, honey.
translation.it: Adam, dai da mangiare a Hawking prima di andare a scuola.

translation.en: -You're still here. -[Louis] Oh. And you're cooking. What are you making? Hi.
translation.it: Sei ancora qui e stai cucinando. Cosa prepari? Ciao.

translation.en: Uh, I know you like the Denver omelet.
translation.it: So che ti piace l'omelette alla Denver.

translation.en: That's not a Denver omelet. That is a cry for help.
translation.it: Quella non è un'omelette alla Denver. È un grido d'aiuto.

translation.en: The eggs are burnt, and the bacon's still somehow totally raw.
translation.it: Le uova sono bruciate e il bacon è inspiegabilmente crudo.

translation.en: Oh, you… Oh, no, no. No, no, no. Wha--
Do you wanna talk about why you're still here instead of being at work?
translation.it: Vuoi dirmi perché sei qui e non al lavoro?

translation.en: I… I… Well, I just wanted to stay home with you today.
translation.it: Beh, oggi volevo rimanere a casa con te.

translation.en: You don't say. I like this guy.
translation.it: Ma tu pensa. Mi piace questo tipo.

translation.en: This guy likes you.
What's going on with you, honey?
Does he seem, uh… does he seem sad to you?
He's an odd duck, like his dad.
translation.it: È un tipo strano, come suo padre.

translation.en: I happen to collect odd ducks.
translation.it: Pare che io ne faccia collezione.

translation.en: I don't know if I should've built that game for him.
translation.it: Avrò fatto bene a creare quel gioco?

translation.en: Shouldn't he be outside, playing with the rest of the kids?
translation.it: Non dovrebbe stare fuori con gli altri bambini?

translation.en: How is he gonna find his place in the world?
translation.it: Come troverà il suo posto nel mondo?

translation.en: "His place in the world"? He's a kid. We're his place in the world.
translation.it: Il suo posto nel mondo? È un bambino. Il suo posto siamo noi.

translation.en: You're his place in the world.
[sighs] Okay, whatever is going on, listen, I can tell you the truth
translation.it: Ok, qualunque cosa stia succedendo, posso dirti la verità

translation.en: or something that's gonna make you feel better.
I'd rather cut to it and tell you the truth, if you're up for it.
I… I'd rather something that'll make me feel better. [laughs] Yeah, I know.
translation.it: - Vorrei che mi facessi sentire meglio. - Sì, lo so.

translation.en: Kidding. Sort of. Okay, tell me.
translation.it: Scherzo. Più o meno. Ok, dimmi.

translation.en: When you are with us… [clicks tongue]
…you're with us 100%.
It's amazing.
And when you're not… [laughs] …it's like… pfft.

translation.en: So is he a little lonely?
Yeah, probably.
But does that make you a shitty guy? No. I've gotta do better.

translation.en: Hey, buddy, I have good news for you.
translation.it: Beh, tesoro, ho ottime notizie per te.

translation.en: He doesn't need perfect. He just needs you.

translation.en: Your cooking makes you a borderline serial killer,

translation.en: but the rest of you is pretty awesome.
translation.it: ma il resto di te è fantastico.

translation.en: You know I love you.
Yeah, I know.
I'm extremely lovable.
Yeah.
I have to go to work.
Okay, okay, okay.
-And, hey, you got time. -[sighs]
"It's later than you think."
[young Adam] Really think we can?
Maybe, maybe not. We'll see.
But we're gonna try anyway.
Destroy time travel. How will we do that?

translation.en: It's 2018, so EM technology isn't stable yet.

translation.en: So here's what we're gonna do. We're gonna blow this bitch up.

translation.en: -Blow it up? -Yep.
How did I live this long? That's a terrible idea.

translation.en: Yeah, well, when a bad idea is the only idea, it becomes a great idea.

translation.en: Who said that?
You. Nine years from now, right before you get arrested.

translation.en: -What? -Try to focus.
We'll have to deal with security. You know this bag of toys you love?

translation.en: Yeah. Being a geek is about to pay off.

translation.en: -Reading me? -[young Adam] Roger that, Red Leader.
This is Butternut Sippy Cup. Ten-four, over.
Let's just talk like normal people, okay?
[young Adam] Copy that…
Red Leader.
Somethin's wrong.
There's nobody here.
Which means they're here.

translation.en: Sorian warned her younger self we were coming. Are you sure?
translation.it: - Sorian deve aver avvertito se stessa. - Tu credi?

translation.en: Oh, pretty sure.
-Don't move. On your knees. -I'm sorry. What?

translation.en: We're taking you back to 2050, Reed.
I can't hear you through the helmet. It muffles a bit. It's hard to hear you.

translation.en: Don't get me wrong, your outfits are incredible though.

translation.en: They're intimidating but also scream, "Please don't hurt me."

translation.en: [soldier] On your knees. I won't tell you again.

translation.en: Well, you… you're right about that.
Adam, what are you doing? I'm about to get my ass kicked.

translation.en: Don't worry. He doesn't wanna fight. They wanna fight. They really, really wanna fight.
translation.it: - Tranquillo. Non vuole battersi. - Sì, invece. Lo vogliono davvero.

translation.en: Just look him in the eyes and smile.
Smile in a way that says, "I want this." "I've been waiting my whole life for this."
translation.it: Come per dire: "È questo che voglio. Aspetto questo momento da tutta la vita".

translation.en: Then hit him in the private bathing suit parts.
-Adam! -Roger that.
Yeah!
Adam, you're on those cars, right? Roger that, middle-aged Adam.

translation.en: Bye. Pfft.
That was invigorating!
-Dad? -Dad?
-I'm sorry. Are you okay? -This close!
translation.it: - Scusa, tutto ok? - A tanto così!

translation.en: -That was amazing. -This close!
-Where's little Adam? -He's fine!
translation.it: - Dov'è il piccolo Adam? - Sta bene!

translation.en: -Hey, hey! -Hey? That's your mother's car.
translation.it: - Ehi! È l'auto di tua madre. - Ehi, a me?

translation.en: The car?
What are you doin' here?
I went to the motel, and when I didn't find you there, I… I figured I'd find you here.

translation.en: It's not like you're keeping a low profile, obviously. What the hell is this?

translation.en: Tell you what? You come up with a plan, and we'll do it your way. Sound good?

translation.en: Oh God. Thank God. There's a plan.

translation.en: I was beginning to think you were making this up as you went along.

translation.en: Adam, I'm goin' inside. Cover the perimeter.
-No one gets in behind me. -Sorry. That was harsh.

translation.en: Roger Dodger.
[Adam] Harsh? You shaved my ass with a Subaru.
translation.it: Esagerato? Mi hai rasato il culo con una Subaru.

translation.en: I… I saved your ass with a Subaru, son.

translation.en: What's Dad doing?
-Dad's being critical. Big surprise. -Okay, I--
translation.it: - Mi critica. Tanto per cambiare. - Ok, io…

translation.en: You're trying to break into a highly sensitive, secure facility with a sixth-grader.
translation.it: Vuoi entrare in una struttura blindata insieme a un dodicenne.

translation.it: Ti fermi un attimo? Fermo. Dove diavolo stai andando?

translation.en: To destroy your accelerator, and I'm gonna enjoy it.
translation.it: A divertirmi mentre distruggo il tuo acceleratore.

translation.en: Do you realize that you have broken every rule?
translation.it: Sai di aver infranto ogni regola?

translation.en: You've blown past every conceivable ethical boundary like it wasn't there.
translation.it: Hai superato ogni possibile limite etico come se fosse aria.

translation.en: Yeah? Then why are you here, Dad?
translation.it: Ah, sì? Allora perché sei qui, papà?

translation.en: Because you can't do it without me.

translation.en: Some people dream of the future.
Here at Sorian Technologies, we're building it.
translation.it: Qui alla Sorian Technologies, noi lo costruiamo.

translation.en: [Louis] If you destroy the accelerator, Sorian will simply rebuild it.
translation.it: Se distruggi l'acceleratore, Sorian lo ricostruirà.

Infinitely Shifting Plasma Containing Algorithm,

translation.en: which I designed to stabilize the wormholes.
That is the mathematical equation that will make time travel possible.
translation.it: Contiene l'equazione che rende possibili i viaggi nel tempo.

translation.en: How do you destroy math?
I've never written the algorithm down or demonstrated it to another human being,

translation.en: so it lives here in the old bean,
translation.it: quindi è solo nella mia testa

translation.en: and in the subbasement in a diamond-hard neuromorphic processor.
translation.it: e nel seminterrato, in un processore neuromorfo durissimo.

translation.en: Are you talking about your penis? Can… can we be serious now?

translation.en: Yes. No. Yes.
-It's a hard drive, okay? -[chuckles]
-God, you're such a child. -Sorry.
There is a crystal hard drive running the algorithm in a closed loop.

translation.en: That is the nerve center of the accelerator.
So we go there, destroy the hard drive, prevent time travel from being invented.
translation.it: Quindi distruggiamo il disco e preveniamo i viaggi nel tempo.

translation.en: Theoretically, time travel--
Oh my God! You're killing me with the theoretical.
-Yes, that should do it. -Good. Let's do that.
-Okay. Okay. -Okay. Okay.
-This is where you work. -Yes.
translation.it: - Quindi è qui che lavori. - Sì.

translation.en: Only took you 44 years to bring me here.
translation.it: Ci hai messo solo 44 anni a portarmici.

translation.en: Fair.
I am so keeping this thing.
-[Adam] So this is it? -[Louis] This is it.
I gotta hand it to you, Dad. You were not messin' around.

translation.it: Qui è dove teniamo il disco rigido.

translation.en: -[Adam] What happens if you pull it out? -[Louis] One of two things.
translation.it: - Che succede se lo estrai? - Due possibilità.

translation.en: The accelerator will continue to run on a dormant loop.
But without the algorithm, no one will ever be able to program it again.
translation.it: Senza l'algoritmo, nessuno potrà mai più programmarlo.

translation.en: Or?
Or there's a cataclysmic meltdown
translation.it: Oppure si verificherà una fusione catastrofica

translation.en: Well, let's hope it's the first thing.
[computer] Neuromorphic hard drive panel accessed.

[Maya] Louis.
[Louis] Maya?
Long time no see.
Oh, this shit's about to get weird.

-We were gonna change the world. -Change the world?
The only thing that's changed is you. Have you lost your mind?
translation.it: L'unica cosa che è cambiata sei tu. Sei impazzita?

translation.en: All these years, I funded your work.
translation.it: Ti ho finanziato per tutti questi anni.

translation.en: I'm not the villain here. I spent millions--
translation.it: Non sono io la cattiva. Ho speso milioni…

translation.en: Hundreds of millions of my money, my wealth. -Mmm. -Just to fund your every indulgence.
translation.it: Centinaia di milioni, tutti di tasca mia, solo per finanziare i tuoi capricci.

translation.en: But this…
this is mine to do with as I please.

translation.en: Now,
give me… the drive.
Just… no.
I thought you were gonna say that.
Come here.
Gimme the gun.
Maya, Jesus Christ.
What are you doing? Are you crazy?
Oh, I think that's well established.
Adam, just listen to her.
It's okay. It's all right.
'Cause Adam's gonna give me the drive right now.

translation.en: Aren't you, Adam?
-Adam? -Adam?
[Sorian] Hey, beautiful idiot. If I shoot him, you die too.

I'm thinking it over.
-What? What do you mean you're thinking? -Yeah.

I'm about to lose my shit here!
-Give her the drive! -Give her the drive, man!
-Give her the drive! -[Maya] Please!

[grunts] Hey! Let me go! [Louis] Adam, just hang on!
-[young Adam] Let me go! -Get me that drive! Now!

This way!
♪ I don't want no more ♪

-Get the drive! -The drive!

Finish him!

[computer] Core breached.

[Maya] Stop!
I want my drive. You can't have it.

Get behind me, both of you.
Look, Dad, Dad, those guns shoot armor-piercing bullets.
So even behind you, we're still Swiss cheese.
translation.it: Anche dietro di te, siamo formaggio svizzero.

translation.en: -Thanks for that information. -You're welcome.
-Maybe spread out a little. -Maybe a good idea.
[Louis] Maya, you're not a murderer.
Not yet, anyway.
[Sorian] Listen to me.
Everything we've worked for, it goes away unless you pull this trigger.
translation.it: Tutto ciò per cui abbiamo lavorato scomparirà, se non premi il grilletto.

translation.en: Okay, come on.
[computer] One minute 30 seconds until lockdown. [Sorian] You can do it.
translation.it: - Un minuto e trenta secondi al blocco. - Puoi farcela.

translation.en: Do it!
Maya, you're better than this.
translation.it: Maya, questo non è da te.

translation.en: Sorry, Louis, but you brought this on yourself.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, Louis, ma te la sei cercata.

translation.en: Maybe so.
You think I'm playing?
Ask your son how I play.
I had to kill his wife twice to protect the integrity of my program.
translation.it: Ho dovuto uccidere sua moglie due volte per proteggere il mio programma.

translation.en: Now, don't think I won't put a bullet right through you.
translation.it: Non pensare che non ti sparerò.

translation.en: Give it to me!
[computer] One minute until lockdown.
You just never understood the bigger picture. [chuckles sadly]
translation.it: Non hai mai capito il quadro d'insieme.

translation.en: And you never understood the science.
How did you know that would work?
Those armor-piercing rounds contain a magnetic steel core.
translation.it: Quei proiettili perforanti contengono un nucleo magnetico.

translation.en: Sometimes it pays to be a nerd, guys.
translation.it: A volte essere un nerd dà i suoi frutti.

translation.en: [computer] Containment protocol initiated.
-Ten seconds remaining. -Whoa.
-Yeah, we should run. -Yep.
[computer] Nine.
Eight.
Seven.
[computer] Six.
-Five. -[Louis] Go! Four.
Three.
-[Louis yelling] Oh, shit! -[computer] Two.
One.
Well, I'd say Bring Your Kid to Work Day was a huge success.
translation.it: Beh, "Porta tuo figlio al lavoro" è stato un successone.

translation.en: -Uh-huh. -Yep.
-[Adam] What are you looking at? -[Louis] You're still here.
I figured after we eliminated time travel, you two would go back to your fixed times.
translation.it: Credevo che voi due sareste tornati nel vostro Tempo Stabilito.

translation.en: It probably takes a while for 30 years of changed time
translation.it: Ci vorrà un po' perché 30 anni di cambiamenti

translation.en: to sort itself out.
[young Adam] I don't think we have long.
I can feel somethin' happening. [Adam] Me too.
translation.it: - Sento che sta succedendo qualcosa. - Anch'io.

translation.en: Sure it's okay for us to be here?
[Louis] It's fine. Your mom takes you to science club on Thursdays.
translation.it: Tua madre ti porta al club di scienze, il giovedì.

translation.en: Look, um… Dad.
[sighs] There's somethin' we need to tell you. I… I already know.
translation.it: - C'è una cosa che dobbiamo dirti. - Lo so già.

translation.en: I knew the moment I saw you.
I'm sorry, boys. I'm, uh…
I'm sorry that I'm… I'm not gonna be there for you down the road,
translation.it: Mi dispiace non poter essere lì per voi in futuro,

translation.en: and I've given it a lot of thought, but you cannot tell me how or when it happens.
translation.it: ma ci ho riflettuto molto e non potete dirmi come o quando accadrà.

translation.en: You came back here
because no one has a right to change the future, including us.
translation.it: perché nessuno deve cambiare il futuro, neanche noi.

translation.en: It's your future.
You're my future. Both of you.
translation.it: Voi siete il mio futuro. Tutti e due.

translation.en: And how lucky am I
that I got to see it?
I haven't been there for you.
translation.it: Non ci sono stato per te.

translation.en: And I'm sorry.
But I saw you being born. I watched you take your first breath.
translation.it: Ma ti ho visto nascere. Ti ho visto fare il tuo primo respiro.

translation.en: And after that happens, nothing is ever the same again.
translation.it: Dopo quel momento, niente è stato più lo stesso.

translation.en: You're my son, Adam, and I love you.
translation.it: Sei mio figlio, Adam. E ti voglio bene.

translation.en: -You're my boy, and I love you. -Okay. You don't have to do all--
translation.it: - Sei il mio ragazzo e ti voglio bene. - Ok. Non serve che…

translation.en: I loved you from the first minute that I saw you.
translation.it: Te ne voglio dal momento che ti ho visto e questo non cambierà mai.

translation.en: -And that will never change. -I… I get that.
translation.it: Te ne voglio dal momento che ti ho visto e questo non cambierà mai. Lo capisco.

translation.en: -Adam, you're my boy. -Dad? We really don't have to do all--
translation.it: - Adam, sei mio figlio. - Papà? Non dobbiamo…

translation.en: -You're amazing. -[Adam] Okay.
-I love you. -I get it, Dad.
I don't think you do.
-I am proud of you. -Okay.
[Louis] I love you, son.
Know that inside your heart. Know… Come here. Come here.
translation.it: Ricordalo, nel tuo cuore. Vieni qui.

translation.en: [Louis] You're my boys, and you'll always be my boys.
translation.it: Siete i miei ragazzi e continuerete a esserlo sempre.

translation.en: Throughout all time.
-[Adam sniffles] I love you, Dad. -[Louis] I love you, buddy.
translation.it: - Ti voglio bene, papà. - Anch'io, figliolo.

translation.en: [whispers] Don't carry this around anymore.
I need you, Dad.
It's so hard without you.
I know.
You're gonna be okay.
-You're gonna be better than okay. -You don't know that.
translation.it: - Starai più che bene. - Non puoi saperlo.

translation.en: Are you kidding me? Have you seen this guy?
translation.it: Scherzi? Ma l'hai visto, questo qui?

translation.en: There's gotta be somethin' we can do. I can think of somethin'.
translation.it: - Dev'esserci qualcosa che possiamo fare. - Un'idea ce l'ho.

translation.en: [Adam] You really gonna do this?
All right.
All right. Can you do me a favor?
translation.it: Va bene. Mi fai un favore?

translation.en: I don't know if we're gonna remember any of this,
but maybe there'll be an echo or somethin', like Laura said.
translation.it: ma forse ci sarà un'eco, come ha detto Laura.

translation.en: But just in case,
give Mom a hug for me.
Would you do that?
Not one of your lame-ass side hugs either.
translation.it: E non uno dei tuoi stupidi mezzi abbracci.

translation.en: I'm talkin' the break-a-rib kinda hug. Yeah?
Yeah.
Holy shit.
What?
I spent 30 years trying to get away from the me that was you.
translation.it: Ho passato 30 anni a cercare di allontanarmi da te.

translation.en: And I'll tell you what, kid.
translation.it: E ti dirò una cosa, ragazzo.

translation.en: I hate to say it, but you were the best part all along.
translation.it: Odio dirlo, ma sei sempre stato la parte migliore di me.

translation.en: -Are we gonna smoke this banana or sit-- -Play ball!
translation.it: - Vogliamo fumare questa banana o… - Palla!

translation.en: Hey there.
Aren't you late for work?
Yeah. I need to pay the insurance on the house.
It's in the calendar, but I can't find the statement.
translation.it: È nel calendario, ma non trovo l'attestato.

translation.en: With that filing system? Shocking.
-Shocking. -[Adam] It should all be online.
[Ellie] This is how Dad did it.
translation.it: Tuo padre faceva così. Dai, aiutami.

translation.en: -Grab a pile, would you? -I'll be late for school.
translation.it: Tuo padre faceva così. Dai, aiutami. Farò tardi a scuola.

translation.en: Oh my gosh. You're right. Okay. Have a great day, honey.
translation.it: Cielo, hai ragione. Va bene. Buona giornata, tesoro.

translation.en: [Adam] Yeah?
Just making sure I wasn't getting mugged.
translation.it: È forse un tentativo di rapina?

translation.en: Maybe you are.
Get over here! Get over here!
I love you, honey. Love you too.
[man] So, as I said earlier, our goal is to calculate the variability of gravitational force,
translation.it: Come ho detto, dobbiamo calcolare la variabilità della forza gravitazionale,

translation.en: which depends entirely on whether your path of motion is toward the Earth or away from it.
translation.it: che dipende interamente dalla traiettoria rispetto alla Terra.

translation.en: So let's define the gravitational force of the Earth on an object
translation.it: Definiamo la forza gravitazionale della Terra su un oggetto

translation.en: by Newton's gravitational formula.
F is equal to big G, Newton's gravitational constant,
translation.it: F equivale a G, la costante di gravitazione.

translation.en: -And r-- -Can you believe this guy?
He's been talking for 15 minutes. Managed to put the entire class to sleep.
translation.it: Parla da 15 minuti. Ha fatto addormentare tutta la classe.

translation.en: You look awake. No. No, no, no, no, no.
I've trained myself to… to fall fast asleep but keep my eyes open.
translation.it: Ho imparato a dormire tenendo gli occhi aperti.

translation.en: Check it out.
-Are you serious? -[snoring]
-Cool, right? -Yeah. -Yeah. -Super cool. [chuckles]
I'm Adam. Adam… Adam Reed.
-Nice to meet you. -Nice to meet you too.
-I'll, um… I'll be quiet. -Okay.
-Where do they find these guest lecturers? -[snickering]
translation.it: Ma dove li trovano questi relatori?

translation.en: Right?
It's like they're genetically engineered to bore us to death.
translation.it: È come se fossero programmati per annoiarci a morte.

translation.en: You're totally a guest lecturer, aren't you?
translation.it: Anche tu sei una relatrice, vero?

translation.en: -Yes, I am. Yeah. -Shit.
What's your field? Um… computational linguistics.
translation.it: - Qual è il tuo campo? - La linguistica computazionale.

translation.en: -No way! -Yeah.
-I don't know what that is. Um… -Oh.
-What does that have to do with flying? -Uh… not a damn thing.
translation.it: - Cosa c'entra con l'aeronautica? - Proprio nulla.

translation.en: -Oh. -Yeah.
Oh. You're in the wrong place, I think.
translation.it: Oh. Credo che tu sia nel posto sbagliato.

translation.en: -That's subjective. This is Schaefer 309? -Literally in the wrong place. Farrel 309.
translation.it: - È soggettivo. È l'aula Schaefer 309. - No, letteralmente. Farrel 309.

translation.en: -No. -Yep.
-No. -Yeah.
[Laura] I don't think that…
-[Adam] Yeah. Oof. -Okay. Oh. -I knew it. -Okay. All right.
translation.it: - Sì. Lo sapevo! - Ok. Va bene.

translation.en: -Bingo. Yeah. -Okay. Okay.
Then I'm in the wrong building.
Actually, you're in the wrong campus.
Then I'm lost.
Not anymore. I found you.
translation.it: Ora non più. Ti ho trovata.

translation.en: I can… I can walk you to Schaefer.
Are you sure? I mean, I would hate to disturb your sleep.
translation.it: Sei sicuro? Non vorrei rovinare il tuo pisolino.

translation.en: I've, uh…
I've got time.
Plus…
Okay.
-Okay. -Yeah.
